src: Iphaliswano Lephasi Leenkutani Zebholo Ephayelwa Etafuleni (i-Table Tennis) Iphaliswano le-ITTF World Table Tennis Championships Final 2023 lizokudlalwa ngomhla wama-20-28 kuMrhayili wee-2023.
tgt: Presidente Cyril Ramaphosa u ta endla Xivijo xa Presidente xa Xikombiso xa Nhluvukiso wa Swifundza (DDM) xa vunhungu eka Xifundza xa Cape Winelands, eKapaVupeladyambu hi siku ra 19 Mudyaxihi 2023 tanihi xiphemu xa matshalatshala ya mfumo ya ku antswisa mphakelo wa vukorhokeri na ku hlohlotela miganga na vaaki lava nga na ku tsakela hi ku angarhela ku va xiphemu xa ku kurisa Afrika-Dzonga swin'we na ku nga siyi munhu endzhaku ka matshalatshala lama.

src: u-Kirsten Neuschäfer ngokuthumba kwakhe iphaliswano elirhanyazelako i-Golden Globe Race lapho athethe khona pheze ama-235 wamalanga athaya ngomkhumbi ngaphandle kwe-GPS nenye ithekhnoloji.
tgt: Sejeni Lwando Lawrence Bunga, Sejeni Mario Nel na Phorisa Lefaka, vaofisiri vanharhu va Vukorhokeri bya Maphorisa ya Afrika-Dzonga lava va dlaweke evhikini leri nga hundza loko va ri karhi va tirha mitirho ya vona eka swifundza swa vona hi ku hambanahambana eka Dorobakulu ra Nelson Mandela na Dorobakulu ra Buffalo City eKapaVuhumadyambu na le Atteridgeville, eGauteng.

src: Itjheje godu nendima eyenziwako ePhawa iKusile yokubuyisela igezi ezii-3 200 MW, ngamaziko 1, 2, 3 ne-5 ethungelelwaneni legezi lelizwe, nakuphela umnyaka wee-2023.
tgt: Yi lemukile ku humelela loku endliweke eka Xitici xa Gezi xa Kusile ko vuyelerisa 3 200 MW, hi ku tirhisa tiyuniti ta 1, 2, 3 na 5, eka giridi ya rixaka hi ku hela ka 2023.

src: IKhabinethi iphatheke kumbi ngeendaba ezimamanga esele ziphikelele, eenkundleni zeendaba ezithi batjho kuseduze ukuthi ithungelelwano legezi lifadalale kuphele ngalo bese sisala emnyameni.
tgt: Khabinete yi vilerisiwa hi ku hangalasiwa ka mahungu ya mavunwa lama hehlaka leswaku giridi ya rixaka yi ta wa leswi nga ta vanga ku timeka ka gizi ka makumu, hi ku tirhisa vuhangalasamahungu bya le ka inthanete.

src: U-Eskom uqinisekise urhulumende ngamahlelo akhona ekuzakukhandelwa ngawo ukuthi kungafiki lapho igezi iphela khona yoke sisale emnyameni ilizwe loke.
tgt: Eskom yi tshembise mfumo hi makungu lama nga kona yo hlayisa sisiteme no sivela ku timiwa ka gezi ra makumu etikweni hinkwaro.

src: IKhabinethi ibuyelela isibawo ebantwini boke beSewula Afrika ukuthi baragele phambili ngokunconcosela igezi.
tgt: Khabinete yi vuyelela xikombelo eka vanhu hinkwavo va Afrika-Dzonga xo ya emahlweni no hlayisa gezi.

src: Umnqopho kukuthi kulondwe i-1 000 MW yegezi qobe lilanga lokhu-ke kulingana nokulonda igezi elingana nehlandla linye lokuqinteliswa kwegezi ilanga nelanga.
tgt: Thagete i ku hlayisa kwalomu ka 1 000 MW masiku hinkwawo, leswi ringana na ku hlayisa xiteji xinwe xa ku timiwa ka gezi hi ku siyerisana siku ri n’wana na rin’wana.

src: Senzo Mchunu uzokubonana noMeyara we-Tshwane uKhansela Cilliers Brink ngeLesihlanu womhla wama-26 kuMrhayili wee-2023 emzameni wokutlama ihlelo elihlanganyelweko lokuvuselela i-Rooiwal WWTW, esele kukade seqa isikhathi sokuyivuselela.
tgt: Holobye wa mati na Mbhasiso, Tatana Senzo Mchunu, u ta hlangana na Meyara wa City of Tshwane, Cllr Cilliers Brink, hi Ravuntlhanu 26 Mudyaxihi 2023 ku ri matshalatshala yo hluvukisa kungu ro hlanganeriwa ra ku pfuxetiwa ka Rooiwal WWTW leswi a swi fanele swi endliwe khale.

src: Eminye imininingwana ungayithola ngokufowunela iZiko leziFo eziThathelwanako (i-NICD) enomborweni yesizo ethi-082 883 9920.
tgt: Ku kuma mahungu hi xitalo u nga fonela nomboro ya 24 wa tiawara leyi vekeriweke Nhlangano wa Mavabyi yo Tlulela wa Rixaka (NICD) eka 082 883 9920.

src: Reuben Brigety, ngamagama akhe awakhuluma athi batjho iSewula Afrika ihlomisa i-Russia (ngeenkhali).
tgt: Vuxaka bya Afrika-Dzonga – United States (US) Khabinete yi tiyisisile leswaku vuxaka exikarhi ka Afrika-Dzonga na US bya ha ri kahle, byi tiyile no vuyerisa matiko hinkwawo ku landza ku hlangana ka Holobye wa Vuxaka bya Matiko ya Misava na Ntirhisano, Dr Naledi Pandor na Muyimeri wa US eAfrika-Dzonga, Tatana Reuben E Brigety, mayelana na mavonelo ya yena lama hehlaka leswaku Afrika-Dzonga yi nyike Rhaxiya matlhari.

src: IKhabinethi isithokozele isimemezelo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sokusungulwa kwephenyo elizijameleko elizakuphenya izwangobatjho ethi iSewula Afrika ihlomisa i-Russia.
tgt: Khabinete yi amukerile xitiviso xa President Cyril Ramaphosa xa ku tumbuluxiwa ka ndzavisiso lowu tiyimeleke ku lavisisa swihehlo swa ku nyikiwa ka Rhaxiya matlhari yo suka eAfrika-Dzonga.

src: UMengameli uRamaphosa ubize iMbizo yesithandathu yobeNgameli nge-DDM eTjingalanga Kapa, kuMasipala we-Drakenstein, esiYingini se-Cape Winelands, ngeLesihlanu womhla we-19 kuMrhayili wee-2023.
tgt: Imbizo ya Presidente ya Xikombiso xa Nhluvukiso ya le ka Xifundza xa Kapavupeladyambu (DDM) Presidente Ramaphosa u yisile DDM ya Imbizo ya Presidente ya vutsevu eKapavupeladyambu, eka Masipala wa Muganga wa Drakenstein, eka Xifundza xa Cape Winelands, hi Ravuntlhanu, 19 Mudyaxihi 2023.

src: Umthangalasisekelo Wezamanzi UMengameli Ramaphosa uvakatjhele ihlelo lokuphakela amanzi i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ngeLesibili womhla wama-23 kuMrhayili wee-2023 lapho abe khona nesandla ekambisweni yokuphendulwa kwesoyi yesiGaba 2 salelihlelo.
tgt: Rendzo ra Vulanguteri ro ya eka Masipala wa Dorobankulu ra eThekwini na Masipala wa Xifundza xa uMgungundlovu hi ti 18 na ti 19 Mudyaxihi 2023.

src: I-Lesotho Highlands Water Project iqakathekile ekuqinisekiseni ukutholakala kwamanzi e-Gauteng, eFreyistata, eMpumalanga, eTlhagwini Tjingalanga kunye neTlhagwini Kapa.
tgt: Xandla xa Presidente Paul Mashatile u tihlanganisile na vatekaxiave va le ka dyondzo na vuleteri, vurimi, mabindzu na vumaki hi nkarhi wa rendzo ra vulanguteri ro ya eka Masipala wa Dorobankulu ra eThekwini na Masipala wa Xifundza xa uMgungundlovu tanihi xiphemu xa marendzo ya vulanguteri ya DDYin’wana ya tiphurojeke ta nkoka leti endzeriweke i ndhawu ya Phurojeke ya Xihatla ya le Ntshongweni, laha ku nga eku akiweni ka Doroba ra Manyunyu exikarhi ka Durban na Pietermaritzburg.

src: IVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali ye-Ofisi kaMengameli izokwethulwa ngeLesithathu womhla wama-31 kuMrhayili wee-2023 kanti-ke umhlangano nembikiindaba ngeNdima yamaTjhuguluko aQakathekileko nangamaGadango wemiSebenzi ahlanganiswe nge-Operation Vulindlela uzokubanjwa ngeLesibili womhla wama-30 kuMrhayili wee-2023.
tgt: Xedulu ya Tivhoti ta Mipimanyeto leti taka na tinhlengeletano to tivisa vahangalasi va mahungu leti ti seketelaka tivhoti: Ravuntlhanu 26 Mudyaxihi 2023 hi 13:00, Holobye wa Mafumele ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko (CoGTA), Manana Thembi Nkadimeng, u ta khoma nhlengelatano yo tivisa vahangalasi va mahungu hi Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya CoGTA leyi nga ta andlala magoza lama kongomisiweke eka ku tiyisa matirhelo ya timasipala.

src: ILanga Le-Afrika Nomnyaka Wama-20 WeHlelo LokweLusana Kwamazwe We-Afrika (i-APRM) IKhabinethi nawo woke amaSewula Afrika ahlanganyela nelizwekazi le-Afrika nephasi loke ekugidingeni iLanga le-Afrika ngeLesine womhla wama-25 kuMrhayili.
tgt: Hi Ravumbirhi, 30 Mudyaxihi 2023, Holobye wa Nhluvukiso wa Vaaki, Manana Lindiwe Zulu, na Holobye wa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso, Tatana Ronald Lamola, va ta khoma Tivhoti ta Mipimanyeto naswona vuxokoxoko bya tinhlengeletano to tivisa vahangalasi va mahungu ti ta tivisiwa hi nkarhi lowu faneleke.

src: Umnyaka lo uqakatheke ngokukhethekileko njengoba phela ukuhlangana kwama-60 weminyaka kwatlikitlwa umtlolo wokusungulwa kweHlangano yoBunye be-Afrika, esele yaziwa njengeHlanganisela yamaZwe we-Afrika (i-AU).
tgt: Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya Hofisi ya Presidente yi ta andlariwa hi Ravunharhu, 31 Mudyaxihi 2023 naswona nhlengeletano yo tivisa vahangalasi va mahungu hi ku humelela ka ku Cinca ka Matshamelo ya swilo na Matshalatshala ya Mitirho lama hlanganisiweke hi Operation Vulindlela yi ta khomiwa hi Ravumbirhi, 30 Mudyaxihi Ku tlangela Siku ra Afrika na 20 wa Malembe ya Endlelo ro Kambisisa Tintangha ra Afrika (APRM).

src: IKhabinethi ivumele ukukhethwa kwesizinda esikhethekileko sezomnotho i-Namakwa SEZ e-Aggeneys eTlhagwini Kapa.
tgt: Khabinete yi pasisile ku thyiwa ka Namakwa SEZ eAggeneys eNorthern Cape.

src: Ukukhethwa nokuthukwa kwendawo le njengeSizinda esiKhethekileko sezoMnotho kwenziwe ngokomThetho weeZinda zoMnotho aziKhethekileko wee-2014 (umThetho Nomboro 16 wee-2014) kanti-ke lendawo ekuphakanyiswe ukuthi ibe sizinda somnotho iyingcenye yeHlelo lamaSiso likaMengameli.
tgt: Ku thyiwa loku ringanyetiweke swi endliwa hi ku ya hi Nawu wa Tindhawu ta Ikhonomi yo Hlawuleka, 2014 (Nawu wa 16 wa 2014) naswona SEZ leyi ringanyetiweke i xiphemu xa Nsusumeto wa Presidente wa Vuvekisi.

src: INamakwa SEZ izokuvula ihlelo lokuhlengwa kwezenjiwa zemayini, ukukhiqizwa kwehayithrojini ehlaza, ukwakhiwa nokuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo, ukuvuseleleka kwegezi kunye nokulungiselelwa ukusetjenziswa kwemikhiqizo.
tgt: SEZ ya Namakwa yi ta pfula ku vuyeriwa eka migodi, ku kumiwa ka hayidrojeni leyi pfuxetekaka, Nhluvukiso wa switirhisiwa, eneji leyi pfuxetekaka na ku luamisiwa ka swikumiwa swa vurimi.

src: I-NWRS-3 igadangiswe kubunzinzolwazi be-DWS WEBTOKEUmbiko Ngamagadango Athethwe Mnyango Wezokuvikela (i-DoD) Ukukhalima Ukuziphatha Kwamalunga Webutho Lamajoni Wezokuvikela (i-SANDF) Athunywe Ukuyokusebenza Emahlelweni Wokuncengelela Ukuthula.
tgt: NWRS-3 yi kandziyisiwile eka webusayiti ya DWS eka WEBTOKEXiviko xa mayelana na magoza lama tirhisiweke hi Ndzawulo ya Vusirheleri (DoD) ku lulamisa matikhomelo ya swirho swa Vuthu ra Vusirheleri ra Afrika-Dzonga ra Rixaka (SANDF) leswi yisiweke eka vurhumiwa byo tisa ku rhula.

src: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko wendima yokusebenza eyenziwa yiSewula Afrika ukukhalima ukuziphatha Kwamanye Amalunga we-SANDF athunywe ukuyokusebenza emahlelweni wokuncengelela ukuthula elizwekazini le-Afrika.
tgt: Khabinete yi amukerile xiviko mayelana na ku humelela loku Afrika-Dzonga yi ku endlaka ku lulamisa matikhomeleo ya swin’wana swa swirho swa SANDF leswi yisiweka eka vurhumiwa byo tisa ku rhula eka tikonkulu hinkwaro.

src: Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma e-Hector Pieterson Memorial and Museum e-Soweto.
tgt: N’hweti ya vantswa yi ta simekiwa hi Ravumune, 1 Khotavuxika hi Holobye eka Hofisi ya Presidente wa Vavasti, Vantshwa na Vatsoniwa, Dr Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma eka Xitsundzuxo na Muziyamu wa Hector Pieterson eSoweto.

src: u-Faith Ntokozo Ngcwabe (ojamele umNyango wezeNjiwa nezeemBaseli) Ibhodi Yabanqophisi Yomkhandlu WeJiyosayensi
tgt: Tatana Kelepile Dintwe (Mutsahamaxitulu) Tatana Xolisa Mvinjelwa (Xandla xa Mutshamaxitulu) Gqweta Ntika Maake Dokodela Mayshree Singh Dokodela Siyanda Mngadi Dokodela Ntombifuthi Nxumalo Manana Thobeka Njozela Tatana Andries Moatshe Dokodela Moloko Matlala Tatana Mandla Malindisa

src: UDorh Mmboneni Muofhe kunye no- Nom.
tgt: Dokodela Mmboneni Muofhe na Tatana Mosa Mabuza (CEO).

src: UmThethomlingwa lo uyatholakala kubunzinzolwazi WEBTOKEUmtlamo Womthethomlingwa Wee-2023 Wokutjhugulula Umthetho Olawula I-Nuclear IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende komtlamo womThethomlingwa wokutjhugulula umThetho oLawula i-Nuclear.
tgt: Nawumbisi wa kumeka eka WEBTOKEMpfapfarhuto wa Nawumbisi wa Khomixini ya Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo (PSC) wa 2023 Khabinete yi pasisile ku kandziyisiwa ka mpfapfarhuto wa Nawumbisi wa PSC wa 2023 ku kuma swibumabumelo swa vanhu.

src: Solo kuya ngokuphakama ukuthakasa njengoba sekusele isikhathi esingaphezudlwana kwama-60 wamalanga ukuthi kuthome imiDlalo yePhaliswano leBhigiri yePhasi ye-Netball eKapa ukusukela ngomhla wama-28 kuVelabahlinze ukuyokufika kumhla we-06 kuRhoboyi wee-2023.
tgt: Rendzo leri i xiphemu xa ku sungula ka mfumo ku tiyisisa leswaku nhluvukiso wa vaakindhawu wu endliwa hi ndlela yo hlanganeriwa leyi seketeriwaka hi endlelo ra DDPalamende ya Vutsevu ya Palamende ya Matiko ya Afrika (PAP)4.1 Varhangeri ku suka eka tikonkulu hinwaro va hlengeletanile kusukela hi Musumbunuku, 15 Mudyaxihi 2023 eMidrand, eAfrika-Dzonga hikwalaho ka Palamende ya Vutsevu ya PANtshamo wu ta hela 02 Khotavuxika 20.2 PAP yi lava ku languta mitlhontlho yo fana eka tikonkulu hinkwaro naswona yi andlariwa hi Varhengeri va Afrika ku suka eka tikonkulu hinkwaro.

src: Kungekokuthoma ukuthi iphaliswano lalemidlalo ekara amehlo woke lizokudlalelwa ehlabathini ye-Afrika.
tgt: Khomixini ya Sayense ya le Lwandle ya le Xikarhi ka Mifumo (IOC)5.1 Afrika-Dzonga yi ta nghenela sexini ta vu56 ya huvonkulu leyi nga ta khomeriwa eParis, eFrance kusukela ti 16 ku fikela ti 30 Khotavuxika 20.2 IOC ya nhlangano wa UN wa Dyondzo, Sayense na Mfuwo (IOC-UNESCO) I huvo ya UN leyi nga na vutihlamuleri byo seketela sayense ya le lwandle ya misava hinkwayo na vukorhokeri.3 Afrika-dzonga yi tekela enhlokweni nkoka wa ndzavisiso na mafambiselo ya malwandle ya yona na mimbango ya le tibuweni ta malwandle ku fikelela nhluvukiso lowu kotaka ku yiseka emahlweni.

src: I-KSI South Afrika godu izokusingatha ihlandla lama-20 lemidlalo yekaradi i-KSI Karate World Championship eKapa ukusukela ngomhla we-10 ukuyokufika kumhla we-15 kuVelabahlinze wee-2023, kanti iimfiselabuhle zethu sizithumela esiQhemeni seSewula Afrika (i-Team SA) njengoba sizilungiselela lombuthano wemidlalo erhanyazelako yephasiloke nje.
tgt: Afrika-Dzonga yi rhurhela vunghwazi bya mitlangu leyikulu.1 Vaseketeri va mitlangu ku suka emisaveni hinkwayo va nga langutela ku amukeriwa hi mandla mambirhi ka Ubuntu na malwandla loko va ta eka Khapu ya bolo ya mavoko na Vunghwazi bya Karati ya Misava ya Kimura Shukokai International (KSI) Karate eAfrika-Dzonga.

src: ISewula Afrika isingethe ngokuzikhakhazisa iPhaliswani lamaFayinali leenKutani leBholo ePhayelwa eTafuleni elidlalelwa e-Durban Internationl Convention Centre njenganje.
tgt: Afrika-dzonga yi na rhekhodo ya ku rhurhela mitlangu leyikulu hi ku hetiseka.2 Nyanyuko wu ya emahlweni wu kula leswi ku nga sala ku hundza masiku ya makumetsevu (60) ku nga se sungula Khapu ya Bolo ya Mavoko eKapa kusukela ti 28 Mawuwani ku fikela ti 6 Mhawuri 2023.

src: Balinganiselwa ema-600 abadlali abavela emazweni ngamazwe wephasi loke abezwana amandla njenganje kilemidlalo, kanti-ke lemidlalo inikela abadlali bekhethu ithuba lokuveza ithalentha labo.
tgt: Leri i ro sungula ku va mphikizano lowu wa ndhuma wu khomeriwa eAfrika.3 Khabinete yi kombela vanhu hinkwavo ku seketela pfhumba ra Ravuntlhanu ra Bolo ya Mavoko, hi ku ambala mpahla ya vaseketeri kumbe ku khavisa hi mihlovo ya rixaka ku seketela xipano xa Afrika-Dzonga xa Bolo ya Mavoko.4 KSI ya Afrika-Dzonga na yona yi rhurhela Vunghwazi bya Karati ya Misava ya KSI ya vu20 eKapa kusukela ti 10 kufikela ti 15 Mawuwani 2023, naswona ku navelela leswinene ka hina swi hundziseriwa eka Team SA loko yi ri karhi yi lulamisela ntirho lowu wa ndhuma wa misava hinkwayo.5 Afrika-Dzonga yi rhurhela Vunghwazi bya Makumu bya Tinghwazi ta Thenisi ya le Tafuleni ya 2023 hi ku tinyungubyisa eDurban International Convention Centre.

src: Imidlalo le ithome ngomhla wama-20 kuMrhayili wee-2023, kanti-ke izabe iyokuphela ngomhla wama-28 kuye uMrhayili wee-2023.
tgt: Mphikizano wu sungurile hi ti 20 Mudyaxihi 2023 naswona wu ta ya emahlweni kufikela ti 28 Mudyaxihi 2023.Marungula.

src: Imilayezo Siyabathokozisa IKhabinethi ithokozise yabe yezwakalisa neemfiselabuhle zayo:KuNgqongqotjhe wezeeMali u-Enoch Godongwana, owethweswe unongorwana orhanyazelako waboNgqongqotjhe bezeeMali e-Afrika ku-2023 (i-African Banker 2023 Finance Minister of the Year Award), e-Sharm El Sheikh, eGibhithe, ngeLesithathu womhla wama-24 kuMrhayili wee-2023, ngemizamo yakhe yokuwulawula kuhle umnotho weSewula Afrika, ngitjho nanyana iminotho yephasi neyakhona ekhethwapha beyiqokeme nje esikhathini esimnyaka esisandukuphela.
tgt: Ku hoyozelaKhabinete yi hundzisele ku hoyozela na ku navelela leswinene eka: Holobye wa timali, Tatana Enoch Godongwana, loyi a nga nyikiwa Sagwadi ra Mubangi wa Afrika wa Ndhuma wa Holobye wa Timali wa Lembe wa 2023 eSharm El Sheikh, eEgypt hi ravunharhu, 24 Mudyaxihi 2023 hi matshalatshala yo fambisa ikhonomi ya Afrika-Dzonga lembe leri nga hundza eka mbango wo tika wa matiko ya misava na wa laha kaya.

src: EsiQhemeni sikamaKhakhulwararhwe se-Stormers ngokungena kumafayinali wephaliswano i-United Rugby Championship.
tgt: Xipano xa Rhagbi xa Stormers ku va xi fikelela makumu ya United Rugby Championship.

src: I-Stormers izokudlala ne-Irish Musters e-Cape Town Stadium ngoMgqibelo womhla wama-27 kuMrhayili wee-2023.
tgt: Stormers va ta phikizana na Irish Musters Exitediyamu xa Cape Town hi migivela, 27 Mudyaxihi 2023.

src: KuNom Zakes Mda, umtloli wamanoveli weSewula Afrika no-Phrof.
tgt: Tatana Zakes Mda, mutsari wa tinovhele wa laha Afrika-Dzonga na Profesa Tshilidzi Marwala, khale ka Xandla xa Chaselara na Nhloko ya Univhesiti ya Johannesburg, lava nga langiwa eka masagwadi ya Tintlhari ya 2023.

src: Tshilidzi Marwala, owakhe waba liSekela likaTjhansela noPhrinsipali we-Yunivesithi yeJwanisbhege (i-UJ), amagamabo aphakanyiselwe ukufakwa hlangana nalabo abangathweswa unongorwana i-African Genius Awards yomNyaka wee-2023.
tgt: Tatana Mda na Profesa Marwala va langiwile exikarhi ka vanhu 19 lava humeleke va MaAfrika lava nga humelela swinene eka swiyenge swo hambanahambana.

src: UNom Mda noPhrof Marwala amagamabo aphakanyiswe newamanye ama-Afrika ali-19 avela emakorweni ngamakoro lapho enze khona ubuhle obubabazekako.
tgt: Ku chavelela Khabinete yi kombisile ku chavelela eka ndyangu na vanghana va: Muyimeri wa tiko eka Rhiphabliki ra Algeria, Tatana Billy Masetlha, loyi a tirheleke Afrika-Dzonga eka swiyimo swo hambanahambana swa mfumo, ku katsa ku tirha tanihi Mulawurinkulu wa vukorhokeri bya vunhlori.

src: Itjheje godu nendima eyenziwako ePhawa iKusile yokubuyisela igezi ezii-3 200 MW, ngamaziko 1, 2, 3 ne-5 ethungelelwaneni legezi lelizwe, nakuphela umnyaka wee-2023.
tgt: Yi lemukile ku humelela loku endliweke eka Xitici xa Gezi xa Kusile ko vuyelerisa 3 200 MW, hi ku tirhisa tiyuniti ta 1, 2, 3 na 5, eka giridi ya rixaka hi ku hela ka 2023.

src: IKhabinethi iphatheke kumbi ngeendaba ezimamanga esele ziphikelele, eenkundleni zeendaba ezithi batjho kuseduze ukuthi ithungelelwano legezi lifadalale kuphele ngalo bese sisala emnyameni.
tgt: Khabinete yi vilerisiwa hi ku hangalasiwa ka mahungu ya mavunwa lama hehlaka leswaku giridi ya rixaka yi ta wa leswi nga ta vanga ku timeka ka gizi ka makumu, hi ku tirhisa vuhangalasamahungu bya le ka inthanete.

src: U-Eskom uqinisekise urhulumende ngamahlelo akhona ekuzakukhandelwa ngawo ukuthi kungafiki lapho igezi iphela khona yoke sisale emnyameni ilizwe loke.
tgt: Eskom yi tshembise mfumo hi makungu lama nga kona yo hlayisa sisiteme no sivela ku timiwa ka gezi ra makumu etikweni hinkwaro.

src: IKhabinethi ibuyelela isibawo ebantwini boke beSewula Afrika ukuthi baragele phambili ngokunconcosela igezi.
tgt: Khabinete yi vuyelela xikombelo eka vanhu hinkwavo va Afrika-Dzonga xo ya emahlweni no hlayisa gezi.

src: Umnqopho kukuthi kulondwe i-1 000 MW yegezi qobe lilanga lokhu-ke kulingana nokulonda igezi elingana nehlandla linye lokuqinteliswa kwegezi ilanga nelanga.
tgt: Thagete i ku hlayisa kwalomu ka 1 000 MW masiku hinkwawo, leswi ringana na ku hlayisa xiteji xinwe xa ku timiwa ka gezi hi ku siyerisana siku ri n’wana na rin’wana.

src: Senzo Mchunu uzokubonana noMeyara we-Tshwane uKhansela Cilliers Brink ngeLesihlanu womhla wama-26 kuMrhayili wee-2023 emzameni wokutlama ihlelo elihlanganyelweko lokuvuselela i-Rooiwal WWTW, esele kukade seqa isikhathi sokuyivuselela.
tgt: Holobye wa mati na Mbhasiso, Tatana Senzo Mchunu, u ta hlangana na Meyara wa City of Tshwane, Cllr Cilliers Brink, hi Ravuntlhanu 26 Mudyaxihi 2023 ku ri matshalatshala yo hluvukisa kungu ro hlanganeriwa ra ku pfuxetiwa ka Rooiwal WWTW leswi a swi fanele swi endliwe khale.

src: Eminye imininingwana ungayithola ngokufowunela iZiko leziFo eziThathelwanako (i-NICD) enomborweni yesizo ethi-082 883 9920.
tgt: Ku kuma mahungu hi xitalo u nga fonela nomboro ya 24 wa tiawara leyi vekeriweke Nhlangano wa Mavabyi yo Tlulela wa Rixaka (NICD) eka 082 883 9920.

src: Reuben Brigety, ngamagama akhe awakhuluma athi batjho iSewula Afrika ihlomisa i-Russia (ngeenkhali).
tgt: Vuxaka bya Afrika-Dzonga – United States (US) Khabinete yi tiyisisile leswaku vuxaka exikarhi ka Afrika-Dzonga na US bya ha ri kahle, byi tiyile no vuyerisa matiko hinkwawo ku landza ku hlangana ka Holobye wa Vuxaka bya Matiko ya Misava na Ntirhisano, Dr Naledi Pandor na Muyimeri wa US eAfrika-Dzonga, Tatana Reuben E Brigety, mayelana na mavonelo ya yena lama hehlaka leswaku Afrika-Dzonga yi nyike Rhaxiya matlhari.

src: IKhabinethi isithokozele isimemezelo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sokusungulwa kwephenyo elizijameleko elizakuphenya izwangobatjho ethi iSewula Afrika ihlomisa i-Russia.
tgt: Khabinete yi amukerile xitiviso xa President Cyril Ramaphosa xa ku tumbuluxiwa ka ndzavisiso lowu tiyimeleke ku lavisisa swihehlo swa ku nyikiwa ka Rhaxiya matlhari yo suka eAfrika-Dzonga.

src: UMengameli uRamaphosa ubize iMbizo yesithandathu yobeNgameli nge-DDM eTjingalanga Kapa, kuMasipala we-Drakenstein, esiYingini se-Cape Winelands, ngeLesihlanu womhla we-19 kuMrhayili wee-2023.
tgt: Imbizo ya Presidente ya Xikombiso xa Nhluvukiso ya le ka Xifundza xa Kapavupeladyambu (DDM) Presidente Ramaphosa u yisile DDM ya Imbizo ya Presidente ya vutsevu eKapavupeladyambu, eka Masipala wa Muganga wa Drakenstein, eka Xifundza xa Cape Winelands, hi Ravuntlhanu, 19 Mudyaxihi 2023.

src: Umthangalasisekelo Wezamanzi UMengameli Ramaphosa uvakatjhele ihlelo lokuphakela amanzi i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ngeLesibili womhla wama-23 kuMrhayili wee-2023 lapho abe khona nesandla ekambisweni yokuphendulwa kwesoyi yesiGaba 2 salelihlelo.
tgt: Rendzo ra Vulanguteri ro ya eka Masipala wa Dorobankulu ra eThekwini na Masipala wa Xifundza xa uMgungundlovu hi ti 18 na ti 19 Mudyaxihi 2023.

src: I-Lesotho Highlands Water Project iqakathekile ekuqinisekiseni ukutholakala kwamanzi e-Gauteng, eFreyistata, eMpumalanga, eTlhagwini Tjingalanga kunye neTlhagwini Kapa.
tgt: Xandla xa Presidente Paul Mashatile u tihlanganisile na vatekaxiave va le ka dyondzo na vuleteri, vurimi, mabindzu na vumaki hi nkarhi wa rendzo ra vulanguteri ro ya eka Masipala wa Dorobankulu ra eThekwini na Masipala wa Xifundza xa uMgungundlovu tanihi xiphemu xa marendzo ya vulanguteri ya DDYin’wana ya tiphurojeke ta nkoka leti endzeriweke i ndhawu ya Phurojeke ya Xihatla ya le Ntshongweni, laha ku nga eku akiweni ka Doroba ra Manyunyu exikarhi ka Durban na Pietermaritzburg.

src: IVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali ye-Ofisi kaMengameli izokwethulwa ngeLesithathu womhla wama-31 kuMrhayili wee-2023 kanti-ke umhlangano nembikiindaba ngeNdima yamaTjhuguluko aQakathekileko nangamaGadango wemiSebenzi ahlanganiswe nge-Operation Vulindlela uzokubanjwa ngeLesibili womhla wama-30 kuMrhayili wee-2023.
tgt: Xedulu ya Tivhoti ta Mipimanyeto leti taka na tinhlengeletano to tivisa vahangalasi va mahungu leti ti seketelaka tivhoti: Ravuntlhanu 26 Mudyaxihi 2023 hi 13:00, Holobye wa Mafumele ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko (CoGTA), Manana Thembi Nkadimeng, u ta khoma nhlengelatano yo tivisa vahangalasi va mahungu hi Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya CoGTA leyi nga ta andlala magoza lama kongomisiweke eka ku tiyisa matirhelo ya timasipala.

src: ILanga Le-Afrika Nomnyaka Wama-20 WeHlelo LokweLusana Kwamazwe We-Afrika (i-APRM) IKhabinethi nawo woke amaSewula Afrika ahlanganyela nelizwekazi le-Afrika nephasi loke ekugidingeni iLanga le-Afrika ngeLesine womhla wama-25 kuMrhayili.
tgt: Hi Ravumbirhi, 30 Mudyaxihi 2023, Holobye wa Nhluvukiso wa Vaaki, Manana Lindiwe Zulu, na Holobye wa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso, Tatana Ronald Lamola, va ta khoma Tivhoti ta Mipimanyeto naswona vuxokoxoko bya tinhlengeletano to tivisa vahangalasi va mahungu ti ta tivisiwa hi nkarhi lowu faneleke.

src: Umnyaka lo uqakatheke ngokukhethekileko njengoba phela ukuhlangana kwama-60 weminyaka kwatlikitlwa umtlolo wokusungulwa kweHlangano yoBunye be-Afrika, esele yaziwa njengeHlanganisela yamaZwe we-Afrika (i-AU).
tgt: Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya Hofisi ya Presidente yi ta andlariwa hi Ravunharhu, 31 Mudyaxihi 2023 naswona nhlengeletano yo tivisa vahangalasi va mahungu hi ku humelela ka ku Cinca ka Matshamelo ya swilo na Matshalatshala ya Mitirho lama hlanganisiweke hi Operation Vulindlela yi ta khomiwa hi Ravumbirhi, 30 Mudyaxihi Ku tlangela Siku ra Afrika na 20 wa Malembe ya Endlelo ro Kambisisa Tintangha ra Afrika (APRM).

src: IKhabinethi ivumele ukukhethwa kwesizinda esikhethekileko sezomnotho i-Namakwa SEZ e-Aggeneys eTlhagwini Kapa.
tgt: Khabinete yi pasisile ku thyiwa ka Namakwa SEZ eAggeneys eNorthern Cape.

src: Ukukhethwa nokuthukwa kwendawo le njengeSizinda esiKhethekileko sezoMnotho kwenziwe ngokomThetho weeZinda zoMnotho aziKhethekileko wee-2014 (umThetho Nomboro 16 wee-2014) kanti-ke lendawo ekuphakanyiswe ukuthi ibe sizinda somnotho iyingcenye yeHlelo lamaSiso likaMengameli.
tgt: Ku thyiwa loku ringanyetiweke swi endliwa hi ku ya hi Nawu wa Tindhawu ta Ikhonomi yo Hlawuleka, 2014 (Nawu wa 16 wa 2014) naswona SEZ leyi ringanyetiweke i xiphemu xa Nsusumeto wa Presidente wa Vuvekisi.

src: INamakwa SEZ izokuvula ihlelo lokuhlengwa kwezenjiwa zemayini, ukukhiqizwa kwehayithrojini ehlaza, ukwakhiwa nokuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo, ukuvuseleleka kwegezi kunye nokulungiselelwa ukusetjenziswa kwemikhiqizo.
tgt: SEZ ya Namakwa yi ta pfula ku vuyeriwa eka migodi, ku kumiwa ka hayidrojeni leyi pfuxetekaka, Nhluvukiso wa switirhisiwa, eneji leyi pfuxetekaka na ku luamisiwa ka swikumiwa swa vurimi.

src: I-NWRS-3 igadangiswe kubunzinzolwazi be-DWS WEBTOKEUmbiko Ngamagadango Athethwe Mnyango Wezokuvikela (i-DoD) Ukukhalima Ukuziphatha Kwamalunga Webutho Lamajoni Wezokuvikela (i-SANDF) Athunywe Ukuyokusebenza Emahlelweni Wokuncengelela Ukuthula.
tgt: NWRS-3 yi kandziyisiwile eka webusayiti ya DWS eka WEBTOKEXiviko xa mayelana na magoza lama tirhisiweke hi Ndzawulo ya Vusirheleri (DoD) ku lulamisa matikhomelo ya swirho swa Vuthu ra Vusirheleri ra Afrika-Dzonga ra Rixaka (SANDF) leswi yisiweke eka vurhumiwa byo tisa ku rhula.

src: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko wendima yokusebenza eyenziwa yiSewula Afrika ukukhalima ukuziphatha Kwamanye Amalunga we-SANDF athunywe ukuyokusebenza emahlelweni wokuncengelela ukuthula elizwekazini le-Afrika.
tgt: Khabinete yi amukerile xiviko mayelana na ku humelela loku Afrika-Dzonga yi ku endlaka ku lulamisa matikhomeleo ya swin’wana swa swirho swa SANDF leswi yisiweka eka vurhumiwa byo tisa ku rhula eka tikonkulu hinkwaro.

src: Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma e-Hector Pieterson Memorial and Museum e-Soweto.
tgt: N’hweti ya vantswa yi ta simekiwa hi Ravumune, 1 Khotavuxika hi Holobye eka Hofisi ya Presidente wa Vavasti, Vantshwa na Vatsoniwa, Dr Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma eka Xitsundzuxo na Muziyamu wa Hector Pieterson eSoweto.

src: u-Faith Ntokozo Ngcwabe (ojamele umNyango wezeNjiwa nezeemBaseli) Ibhodi Yabanqophisi Yomkhandlu WeJiyosayensi
tgt: Tatana Kelepile Dintwe (Mutsahamaxitulu) Tatana Xolisa Mvinjelwa (Xandla xa Mutshamaxitulu) Gqweta Ntika Maake Dokodela Mayshree Singh Dokodela Siyanda Mngadi Dokodela Ntombifuthi Nxumalo Manana Thobeka Njozela Tatana Andries Moatshe Dokodela Moloko Matlala Tatana Mandla Malindisa

src: UDorh Mmboneni Muofhe kunye no- Nom.
tgt: Dokodela Mmboneni Muofhe na Tatana Mosa Mabuza (CEO).

src: UmThethomlingwa lo uyatholakala kubunzinzolwazi WEBTOKEUmtlamo Womthethomlingwa Wee-2023 Wokutjhugulula Umthetho Olawula I-Nuclear IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende komtlamo womThethomlingwa wokutjhugulula umThetho oLawula i-Nuclear.
tgt: Nawumbisi wa kumeka eka WEBTOKEMpfapfarhuto wa Nawumbisi wa Khomixini ya Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo (PSC) wa 2023 Khabinete yi pasisile ku kandziyisiwa ka mpfapfarhuto wa Nawumbisi wa PSC wa 2023 ku kuma swibumabumelo swa vanhu.

src: Solo kuya ngokuphakama ukuthakasa njengoba sekusele isikhathi esingaphezudlwana kwama-60 wamalanga ukuthi kuthome imiDlalo yePhaliswano leBhigiri yePhasi ye-Netball eKapa ukusukela ngomhla wama-28 kuVelabahlinze ukuyokufika kumhla we-06 kuRhoboyi wee-2023.
tgt: Rendzo leri i xiphemu xa ku sungula ka mfumo ku tiyisisa leswaku nhluvukiso wa vaakindhawu wu endliwa hi ndlela yo hlanganeriwa leyi seketeriwaka hi endlelo ra DDPalamende ya Vutsevu ya Palamende ya Matiko ya Afrika (PAP)4.1 Varhangeri ku suka eka tikonkulu hinwaro va hlengeletanile kusukela hi Musumbunuku, 15 Mudyaxihi 2023 eMidrand, eAfrika-Dzonga hikwalaho ka Palamende ya Vutsevu ya PANtshamo wu ta hela 02 Khotavuxika 20.2 PAP yi lava ku languta mitlhontlho yo fana eka tikonkulu hinkwaro naswona yi andlariwa hi Varhengeri va Afrika ku suka eka tikonkulu hinkwaro.

tgt: Afrika-dzonga yi na rhekhodo ya ku rhurhela mitlangu leyikulu hi ku hetiseka.2 Nyanyuko wu ya emahlweni wu kula leswi ku nga sala ku hundza masiku ya makumetsevu (60) ku nga se sungula Khapu ya Bolo ya Mavoko eKapa kusukela ti 28 Mawuwani ku fikela ti 6 Mhawuri 2023.

src: Balinganiselwa ema-600 abadlali abavela emazweni ngamazwe wephasi loke abezwana amandla njenganje kilemidlalo, kanti-ke lemidlalo inikela abadlali bekhethu ithuba lokuveza ithalentha labo.
tgt: Leri i ro sungula ku va mphikizano lowu wa ndhuma wu khomeriwa eAfrika.3 Khabinete yi kombela vanhu hinkwavo ku seketela pfhumba ra Ravuntlhanu ra Bolo ya Mavoko, hi ku ambala mpahla ya vaseketeri kumbe ku khavisa hi mihlovo ya rixaka ku seketela xipano xa Afrika-Dzonga xa Bolo ya Mavoko.4 KSI ya Afrika-Dzonga na yona yi rhurhela Vunghwazi bya Karati ya Misava ya KSI ya vu20 eKapa kusukela ti 10 kufikela ti 15 Mawuwani 2023, naswona ku navelela leswinene ka hina swi hundziseriwa eka Team SA loko yi ri karhi yi lulamisela ntirho lowu wa ndhuma wa misava hinkwayo.5 Afrika-Dzonga yi rhurhela Vunghwazi bya Makumu bya Tinghwazi ta Thenisi ya le Tafuleni ya 2023 hi ku tinyungubyisa eDurban International Convention Centre.

src: Imidlalo le ithome ngomhla wama-20 kuMrhayili wee-2023, kanti-ke izabe iyokuphela ngomhla wama-28 kuye uMrhayili wee-2023.
tgt: Mphikizano wu sungurile hi ti 20 Mudyaxihi 2023 naswona wu ta ya emahlweni kufikela ti 28 Mudyaxihi 2023.Marungula.

src: Imilayezo Siyabathokozisa IKhabinethi ithokozise yabe yezwakalisa neemfiselabuhle zayo:KuNgqongqotjhe wezeeMali u-Enoch Godongwana, owethweswe unongorwana orhanyazelako waboNgqongqotjhe bezeeMali e-Afrika ku-2023 (i-African Banker 2023 Finance Minister of the Year Award), e-Sharm El Sheikh, eGibhithe, ngeLesithathu womhla wama-24 kuMrhayili wee-2023, ngemizamo yakhe yokuwulawula kuhle umnotho weSewula Afrika, ngitjho nanyana iminotho yephasi neyakhona ekhethwapha beyiqokeme nje esikhathini esimnyaka esisandukuphela.
tgt: Ku hoyozelaKhabinete yi hundzisele ku hoyozela na ku navelela leswinene eka: Holobye wa timali, Tatana Enoch Godongwana, loyi a nga nyikiwa Sagwadi ra Mubangi wa Afrika wa Ndhuma wa Holobye wa Timali wa Lembe wa 2023 eSharm El Sheikh, eEgypt hi ravunharhu, 24 Mudyaxihi 2023 hi matshalatshala yo fambisa ikhonomi ya Afrika-Dzonga lembe leri nga hundza eka mbango wo tika wa matiko ya misava na wa laha kaya.

src: EsiQhemeni sikamaKhakhulwararhwe se-Stormers ngokungena kumafayinali wephaliswano i-United Rugby Championship.
tgt: Xipano xa Rhagbi xa Stormers ku va xi fikelela makumu ya United Rugby Championship.

src: I-Stormers izokudlala ne-Irish Musters e-Cape Town Stadium ngoMgqibelo womhla wama-27 kuMrhayili wee-2023.
tgt: Stormers va ta phikizana na Irish Musters Exitediyamu xa Cape Town hi migivela, 27 Mudyaxihi 2023.

src: KuNom Zakes Mda, umtloli wamanoveli weSewula Afrika no-Phrof.
tgt: Tatana Zakes Mda, mutsari wa tinovhele wa laha Afrika-Dzonga na Profesa Tshilidzi Marwala, khale ka Xandla xa Chaselara na Nhloko ya Univhesiti ya Johannesburg, lava nga langiwa eka masagwadi ya Tintlhari ya 2023.

src: Tshilidzi Marwala, owakhe waba liSekela likaTjhansela noPhrinsipali we-Yunivesithi yeJwanisbhege (i-UJ), amagamabo aphakanyiselwe ukufakwa hlangana nalabo abangathweswa unongorwana i-African Genius Awards yomNyaka wee-2023.
tgt: Tatana Mda na Profesa Marwala va langiwile exikarhi ka vanhu 19 lava humeleke va MaAfrika lava nga humelela swinene eka swiyenge swo hambanahambana.

src: UNom Mda noPhrof Marwala amagamabo aphakanyiswe newamanye ama-Afrika ali-19 avela emakorweni ngamakoro lapho enze khona ubuhle obubabazekako.
tgt: Ku chavelela Khabinete yi kombisile ku chavelela eka ndyangu na vanghana va: Muyimeri wa tiko eka Rhiphabliki ra Algeria, Tatana Billy Masetlha, loyi a tirheleke Afrika-Dzonga eka swiyimo swo hambanahambana swa mfumo, ku katsa ku tirha tanihi Mulawurinkulu wa vukorhokeri bya vunhlori.

src: NgoSewula wee-2022, uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wathumela iPalamende ihlelo likarhulumende lokuphumelelisa iimphakamiso zeKomitjhini yePhenyo.
tgt: Hi nhlangula 2022, Phuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa u rhumele ePalamende kungu ra mfumo ra nsimeko wa swibumabumelo swa Khomixini leyi.

src: Isivumelwano Serherhokambiso Ne-France Sokungezelela Amandla wePhiko eliKhethekileko lezokuPhenya (i-SIU) ISewula Afrika, ebeyijanyelwe nguNgqongqotjhe wezobuLungiswa nezokuVuselelwa kweSimilo, uNom.
tgt: Afrika-Dzonga, leyi yimeriweke hi Holobye wa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso, Ttn Ronald Lamola na Furwa, leyi yimeriweke hi Holobye wa Yuropa na Timhaka ta Matiko Mambe, Mhn Catherine Colonna, ma sayinile ntwanano wa matiko ya misava wa ximfumo wa ntirhisano lowu wu nga ta engetela vuswikoti bya SINtirhisano lowu wu ta nyika vuswikoti eka SIU hi mayelana na vulavisisi bya le ka inthanete, vugevenga bya timali na swikili swo xopaxopa.

src: Ukusebenzisanokhu kuzakwenza ukuthi kugcine kuvulwe isiKolo esiLwa nobuKhohlakali ePitori.
tgt: Xinakulobye xi ta vanga ku tumbuluxiwa ka Akhademi yo Lwisana na Vukungundzwana ePitori.

src: Isikolwesi sizakusebenzela amalunga we-SIU, ezinye iinjamiso ezibathobelisimthetho nezilwa nobukhohlakali zamazwe athuthukisa i-Afrika engeSewula (i-SADC), namazwe we-Commonwealth kunye nalawo angasimalunga we-Commonwealth.
tgt: Akhademi leyi yi ta korhokela swirho swa SIU, na tiejensi ta nsindziso wa nawu na to lwisana na vukungundzwana tin'wana leti ti kumekaka eka matiko lama nga swirho ya Muganga wa Nhluvukiso wa Dzongeni wa Afrika, matiko lama a ma ri ehansi ka Britain na lama a ma nga ri ehansi ka Britain.

src: LeliBandla ligandelele ubujamo nomkhumbulo weSewula Afrika wokungathathi hlangothi kunye nokuzibophelela kwelizweli ekurarululeni imiraro ngokuthula.
tgt: Mixini wa ku Rhula wa Afrika Khabinete yi amukele ku nyikiwa vuxokoxoko hi Phuresidente Ramaphosa hi mayelana na Mixini wa ku Rhula wa Afrika wo ya eUkraine na Federexini ya Russia lowu eka wona Phuresidente a tekeke xiaveswin'we na varhangeri na vayimeri va mifumo ya Senegal, Comoros, Zambia, Egypt, Congo-Brazzaville, na Uganda.

src: IKhabinethi itjheje ukuthi uMengameli we-Ukraine u-Volodymyr Zelensky noMengameli we-Russia u-Vladimir Putin balithokozele igadango lokuthula le-Afrika babe bazibophelela nekusebenzisaneni nabarholi be-Afrika ukuya phambili eendabeni eziphakanyisiweko zokulamula ukurarana ngokuthula.
tgt: Mixini wu tiyise xiyimo lexi nga na milawu xa Afrika-Dzonga xa ku teki rihlanguti na vutiboheleri bya tiko eka xitshunxo xa ku rhula xa ntlimbo lowu.

src: IBandleli likhulume lagandelela ngesidingo sokwehlisa ukurarana nezipi kobanyana imikhulumiswano izokuthoma ngokurhabako malungana nokubuyiselwa kwabantwana abathethwe e-Ukraine, kuvulelwe iimbotjhwa zepi bekuvulwe namathuba wokuphumelelisa ukusizwa khudlwana kwabantu abadinge isizo lobuntu.
tgt: Khabinete yi lemuke leswaku Phuresidente Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine na Phuresidente Vladimir Putin wa Federexini ya Russia va amukele pfhumba ra ku rhula ra Afrika naswona va tibohe eka ku vulavurisana ku yisa emahlweni na varhangeri va le Afrika hi mayelana na timhaka leti boxiweke eka xitshunxo xa ku rhula xa ntlimbo.

src: Fholisani Sydney Mufamadi uzokuya emHlanganweni weenKhulu ngezokuThula, obizwe nguMengameli Zelensky, ozakubanjelwa e-Copenhagen, e-Denmark, ngoRhoboyi.
tgt: Mutsundzuxi wa Nsirhelelo wa Rixaka wa Phuresidente Ramaphosa, yena Phrf Fholisani Sydney Mufamadi, u ta ya eka Samiti ya ku Rhula, leyi rhambiweke hi Phuresidente Zelenksy, leyi yi nga ta va kona eCopenhagen, Denmark, hi Mhawuri.

src: Ukurhwebelana hlangana kweSewula Afrika ne-China kukhuphuke ngama-30% ukusukela emabhiliyonini ama-US$44 ngomnyaka wee-2018 kwayokuba ma-US$57 wamabhiliyoni, nakuphela umnyaka wee-2022.
tgt: Khabinete yi lemuke tinhlayo ta mabindzu ta sweswinyana tanihilaha ti andlariweke hakona hi Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu, vumaki na Mphikizano leti kombeke leswaku tinhundzu ta Afrika-Dzonga leti rhumeriwaka eChina ti fike eka US$33 wa tibiliyoni hi 2022, hi kambirhi kutlula levhele ya mutirhisani wo bindzurisa lonkulu kutlula hinkwavo, Jarimani.

src: Ukusukela ngomnyaka wee-2018 ukuyokufika kowee-2022, kulinganiswe ukwanda kwepahla ethengiselwe ngaphandle nge-10%, kwathi ethengwa ngaphandle yaba ma-4,5% ngomnyaka.
tgt: Hi ku angarhela, mabindzu ya Afrika-Dzonga-China ya tlakuke hi 30% kusuka eka US$44 wa tibiliyoni hi 2018 kufika eka US$57wa tibiliyoni hi kuhela ka 2022.

src: .2 IsiGaba 2A semali emaBhiliyoni amaNe wamaRanda se-Mokolo Crocodile Water Augmentation Project eTlhagwini Tjingalanga ne-Limpopo.
tgt: Ntirho wu ta hetiwa hi Xiyimo xa 2A xa R4 wa tibiliyoni xa Phurojeke yo Engetela Mati ya Mokolo Crocodile eN'walungu-Vupeladyambu eLimpopo.

src: Kusabuthelelwa iimali zokusekela esinye isigaba umsebenzi wakhona ozakuthoma ngoMrhayili wee-2024, ekuhlelelwe ukuthi uphele ngomnyaka wee-2030.
tgt: Mali yi le ku hlengeletiweni eka xiyimo xin'wana lexi vuaki byi nga ta sunguriwa hi Mudyaxihi 2024, ku ri na ku hetisiwa loku kunguhateriweke ku va hi Eka xinakulobye exikarhi ka mfumo na sekitara ya vucelamigodi, vuaki byi le ku endlekeni eka phurojeke ya Nhluvukiso wa Swipfuno swa Mati swa Nambu wa Olifants ya R24 wa tibiliyoni eLimpopo, ku ri na ku hetiwa loku languteriwaka hi Eka xinakulobye xo fana hi migodi leyi nga eKapa-N'walungu, vuaki byi ta sungula endzhakunyana ka lembe leri eka phurojeke ya Vaal Gamagara ya R10 ra tibiliyoni laha ku hetiwa na kona ku languteriwaka kwalomuya ka Vuaki byi sungule n'hweti yaleyi, Khotavuxika 2023, eka Phurojeke yo Engetela Mati ya Groot Letaba eLimpopo, leyi yi khumbaka ku tlakusiwa ka Damu Tzaneen.

src: Iinqunto ZeKhabinethi Ukuqiniswa YiSewula Afrika Kwerherhokambiso Le-Luxembourg Esivumelwaneni Seenrhuluphelo Zamazwe Ngamazwe Ngeensetjenziswa Eziphathwako Eendabeni Eziqalene Nepahla Ejayelekileko Ekhanjiswa Ngesitimela IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende kwe-Luxembourg Rail Protocol kobanyana iyokuqinisekiswa beyitlikitlwe ngokusemthethweni.
tgt: Swiboho swa Khabinete Ku Amukeriwa ka Afrika-Dzonga ka Milawu ya Luxembourg ya Ntwanano wa Mitsakelo ya Matiko ya Misava eka Switirhisiwa swo Fambafamba hi mayelana na Timhaka leti Kongomanaka na Matorokisi Khabinete yi pasise xiringanyeto xa Milawu ya Swiporo swa Luxembourg ePalamende leswaku xi amukeriwa.

src: Irherhokambiso ye-Luxembourg Rail Protocol likhwezelela ukuhluma komnotho ngokukhuthaza ukusekela ngeemali kwekoro yangeqadi emsebenzini weentimela.
tgt: Milawu ya Swiporo ya Luxembourg yi kondletela ku kula ka ikhonomi hi ku tiyisa sekitara leyi nga riki ya mfumo leyi nyikaka timali eka indasitiri ya swiporo.

src: Sandile Psychology Mkhize oqatjhelwe isikhundla sokuba mPhathi oyiHloko (i-CEO) weBhodi yezaManzi i-Magalies Water (ikontragakhe ingezelelelwe isikhathi).
tgt: Ttn Sandile Psychology Mkhize tanihi Muofisirinkulu wa Vurhangerinkulu wa Magalies Water (ku engeteriwa ka kontiraka).

src: Amalunga WomKhandlu WokuRhubhulula NgezokuLima
tgt: Swirho swa Khansele ya Ndzavisiso wa Vurimi: Mhn Joyene Isaacs (ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa) Dkd Poncho Mokaila (ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa) Dkd Jonty Tshipa Ttn Neo Harrison Masithela Mhn Clarinda Elizabeth Simpson Dkd Hilke Maartens Ttnr Goodman Gcaba (ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa) Dkd Troy Govender

src: Joyene Isaacs (obuyiselwe esikhundleni sakhe)
tgt: Dkd Konanani Liphadzi (ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa) Dkd Pieter Naude Malan (ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa) na Dkd Owen Horwood.

src: Jonty Tshipa Nom.
tgt: Ttn Tshepo Peege.

src: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhugulula umThetho wokuTlhalana/weSehlukaniso womnyaka we-1979 (umThetho Nomboro 70 we-1979) kobanyana kuzokuba neendlela zokuvikela ihlalakuhle yabantwana namkha yabantwana abasese ngaphasi kwesandla sababelethi ababelethelwe emtjhadweni wama-Muslim.
tgt: Rendzo leri ri ta gimeta eKapa-Vupeladyambu tanihi xifundza lexi rhurhelaka, ku nga si sungula thonamente leyi hi siku ra 28 Mawuwana 2023.5 Banyana Banyana va suka ku ya eka Khapi ya Misava ya FIFA ya Vavasati.1 Hi ku yimela rixaka, Khabinete yi navelele leswinene eka xipano xa bolo ya milenge ya vavasati ya rixaka, Banyana Banyana, tanihiloko xi ri eku lulamiseleni ku suka hi Ravuntlhanu 23 Khotavuxika 2023, kuya eka Khapi ya Misava ya FIFA ya Vavasati leyi yi nga ta khomeriwa eAustralia na le New Zealand hi Mawuwana.2 Matirhelo ya xipano eka tithonamente to hambanahambana ma tisile nkongomiso wa miehleketo wa misava hinkwayo eka nhluvukiso wa ntlangu wa vavasati eAfrika-Dzonga, tanihi xiphemu xa vutihavexerisi byo angarhela havexeriso wa rixaka wa vavasati etikweni.

src: Ikhotho yathola ukuthi ingcenye yomThetho wokuTlhalana/weSehlukaniso iphambana nomThethosisekelo ngoba ibandlulula ngokungakalungi abantwana bababelethi abathetheneko ibandlulule nabantwana bababelethi abangakathathani.
tgt: VuhoyozeriKhabinete yi hundzise vuhoyozeri bya yona na ku navelela leswinene eka: Vatlangi va thenisi va tiwhilichere va le Afrika-Dzonga Donald Ramphadi na Kgothatso Montjane lava va humeleleke tanihi tinghwazi ta Grand Slam eka swiavo swo vona hi ku hambana eka thonamente ya Roland Garros yo xiximeka eFurwa.

src: I-ARF iqakatheke khulu ekukhuthazeni iinrhuluphelo namagugu weSewula Afrika, iHlelo lokuVuselelwa kwe-Afrika kunye nokwakhiwa kwephasi elingcono elizakuzuzwa babantu boke.
tgt: Mhn P Khoza loyi a hlawuriweke tanihi Phuresidente wa Huvo ya ICAO ya 42 leyi yi veke kona kusuka 27 Ndzati ku fika 7 Nhlangula eMontreal, Canada Michavelelo Khabinete yi hundzise michavelelo ya yona eka ndyangu na vanghana va: Xirho xa Palamende, Mhn Tina Joemat-Pettersson, loyi a ri Mutshamaxitulu wa Komiti ya Photifoliyo ya Huvo ya Rixaka hi mayelana na Maphorisa, naswona loyi eka nkarhi lowu nga hundza a tirha tanihi Holobye wa Vurimi, Swihlahla, na Tinhlampfi na Holobye wa Eneji.

src: Zegezi Ikhabinethi ithokozele ubungcono bomThamo weGezi oTholakalako, njenganje olalamela ama-70%.
tgt: IMiba enguNdaba-mlonyeni Ezamandla IKhabhinethi iyamkele inkqubela yoMba wokuFumaneka koMbane kwa-Eskom, ngoku isondele kuma-70%.

src: u-Mette Frederiksen eliqinise isikhozi seSewula Afrika namazwe amabili la emkhakheni wehayidrojini ehlaza, igezi evuselelwako ne-JELelikhambo libuthelele abatjalimali ngeSewula Afrika ukuzokuqinisa amazinga aphakemeko wetjhebiswano nesikhozi esihle hlangana nelizwe lekhethu nabatjhebisani ababilaba abaqakathekileko beYurophu.
tgt: Utyelelo lokuSebenza ebeliQhutywe ngokuBambisana yi-Netherlands ne-Denmark IKhabhinethi ilwamkele uTyelelo lokuSebenza ngokuManyeneyo olube yimpumelelo phakathi kweNkulumbuso yase-Netherlands, uMnu Mark Rutte kunye neNkulumbuso yase-Denmark, uNks Mette Frederiksen oluqinise ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika nala mazwe mabini kwimiba yehaydrojini engenabungozi kokusingqongileyo, amandla ahlaziyekayo kunye ne-JEUtyelelo kwakhona lwazisa iqela labatyali-mali eMzantsi Afrika ukuqinisa amanqanaba aphezulu entsebenziswano kunye nobudlelwane obuhle phakathi kwelizwe kunye namaqabane amabini abalulekileyo aseYurophu.

src: Lokha negade kubanjwe ehlanganyelweko yangokomthetho le, kutlikitlwe isiVumelwano sokuZwana emKhakheni weHayidrojini eHlaza hlangana neSewula Afrika ne-Netherlands, godu kwatjhugululwa nesivumelwano hlangana neSewula Afrika ne-Denmark mayelana neHlelo leTjhebiswano yeTuthuko yeHlelo leTjhebiswano lezaMandla lomnyaka wee-2017.
tgt: Ngexesha leengxoxo ezisemthethweni ezidibeneyo, isiVumelwano sokuSebenzisana kuMmandla weHaydrojini Engenabungozi kokusiNgqongileyo satyikitywa phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-Netherlands, ngelixa isivumelwano phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-Denmark malunga neNtsebenziswano yoPhuhliso enxulumene neNkqubo yeNtsebenziswano yezaMandla yonyaka wama-2017 salungiswa.

src: UMengameli Ramaphosa uhlanganyele mhlapha nabarholi bemikhakha yomithathu (belizweloke, beemfunda nebeendawo zemakhaya) karhulumende, kwabanjwa IMbizo kaMengameli ye-DDM yeKhomba yomBuso weHlandla lesiThandathu ngeLesihlanu, mhla ama-30 kuMgwengweni wee-2023 kuMasipala wesiYingi soThukela KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt: Imbizo kaMongameli yeNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweZithili yaKwaZulu-Natala (i-DDM) UMongameli Ramaphosa, edibene neenkokheli eziphuma kuwo omathathu amanqanaba oburhulumente (kuzwelonke, kwiphondo nakwingingqi), bathabathe iMbizo kaMongameli yesiXhenxe ye-DDM yoLawulo lweSithandathu ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-30 kweyeSilimela 2023 kuMasipala weSithili uThukela KwaZulu-Natala.

src: IHayidrojini EHlaza IKhabinethi ibuye yathokozela nesimemezelo esihlanganyelweko sokuhlonywa kwesiQhema seSewula Afrika nese-Germany seHayidrojini eHlaza (i-South African-German Hydrogen Task Force) esitlikitlwe nguNgqongqotjhe wezeGezi nge-Ofisini kaMengameli, uDorh.
tgt: IHaydrojini Engenabungozi kokusiNgqongileyo IKhabhinethi iphinde yasamkela isibhengezo esihlangeneyo senjongo yokuseka uMbutho waBasebenzi beHaydrojini eMzantsi Afrika naseJamani, esatyikitywa nguMphathiswa okwi-Ofisi kaMongameli ojongene noMbane, uGq Kgosientsho Ramokgopa kunye noSekela-Tshansela waseJamani u-Robert Habeck.

src: UNom Sibusiso Bukhosini oqatjhelwe ukuba ngu-CEO we-Isimangaliso Wetland Park Authority (ubuyiselwe esikhundleni sakhe).
tgt: UMnu Sibusiso Bukhosini njengeGosa eliyiNtloko yesiGqeba ye-Isimangaliso Wetland Park Authority (uqeshiwe kwakhona).UNks Tamlyn Bouwer njengeGosa eliPhethe i-Ofisi yeMali yeBhunga leSizwe lokuBhalisa abaKhi bezindlu.

src: UMm u-Tamlyn Bouwer oqatjhelwe ukuba mPhathi weeMali oyiHloko yomKhandlu wokuTloliswa kwaboSogontraga beziNdlu beliZweloke (i-National Home Builders Registration Council).
tgt: UMnu Morongwa Calvin Molongoana njengoSekela Mlawuli-Jikelele (u-DDG): kwicandelo le-Statistics Support and Informatics kwiZiko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika.

src: UNom Morongwa Calvin Molongoana oqatjhelwe ukuba liSekela lomNqophisi Zombelele (i-DDG): we-Statistical Support and Informatics e-Stats SUMm u-Daphne Yandiswa Morudu oqatjhelwe ukuba ngu-DDG: we-South African National Statistics System kwa-Stats SUNom Rory Gallocher oqatjhelwe ukuba mPhathi oyiHloko yemiSebenzi nge-Ofisini kaMengameli.
tgt: UNks Daphne Yandiswa Morudu njengo-DDG: INkqubo yeeNkcukacha-manani yeSizwe yaseMzantsi Afrika kwiZiko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika UMnu Rory Gallocher njengeGosa eliPhezulu leMisebenzi kuBongameli.

src: IPhaliswano Le-Netball LeBhegere YePhasi Le-2023 2023 Emalangeni ezako, amehlo wabalandeli bezemidlalo azokuqala eKapa, eSewula Afrika nakuthoma iPhaliswano le-Netball leBhegere yePhasi lomnyaka wee-2023, ukuthoma mhla ama-28 kuVelabahlinze ukufikela nakasi-6 kuRhoboyi.
tgt: INdebe yeHlabathi yabaseTyhini ye-FIFA yowama-2023 IBanyana Banyana, iiNtshatsheli ze-Afrika ezilawulayo, kunye neqhayiya lesizwe, iza kuthwala amathemba namaphupha oMzantsi Afrika xa ithatha inxaxheba kwiNdebe yeHlabathi yabaseTyhini ye-FIFA yowama-2023 e-New Zealand nase-Australia ukusuka ngomhla wama-20 kweyeKhala ukuya kowama-20 kweyeThupha 2023.

src: Issues in the Environment.
tgt: Issues in the Environment.

src: South African National Taxi Council (SANTACO) Western Cape taxi strike Cabinet was briefed about the ongoing impasse between SANTACO Western Cape and the City of Cape Town, which has escalated into a violent strike as a result of the impounding of taxi vehicles by the City of Cape Town.
tgt: South African National Taxi Council (SANTACO) Western Cape taxi strike Cabinet was briefed about the ongoing impasse between SANTACO Western Cape and the City of Cape Town, which has escalated into a violent strike as a result of the impounding of taxi vehicles by the City of Cape Town.

src: Cabinet condemns the violence and anarchy in Cape Town and has called on SANTACO to ensure that its protest action is peaceful and does not interfere with the rights of others.
tgt: Cabinet condemns the violence and anarchy in Cape Town and has called on SANTACO to ensure that its protest action is peaceful and does not interfere with the rights of others.

src: In this regard, we have noted that there were no violent incidents in the last 48-hours.
tgt: In this regard, we have noted that there were no violent incidents in the last 48-hours.

src: However, members of the South African Police Service and other law-enforcement agencies have been directed to ensue violent situation is under control to allow residents safe movement to school, work and their normal daily activities.
tgt: However, members of the South African Police Service and other law-enforcement agencies have been directed to ensue violent situation is under control to allow residents safe movement to school, work and their normal daily activities.

src: Cabinet was also briefed about the City of Cape Town’s imposing of taxi operating conditions which are at variance with both the National Road Traffic, 1996 (Act 93 of 1996) and the National Land Transport Act, 2009 (Act 5 of 2009), which regulate the traffic offences and applicable penalties, including the impounding of vehicles.
tgt: Cabinet was also briefed about the City of Cape Town’s imposing of taxi operating conditions which are at variance with both the National Road Traffic, 1996 (Act 93 of 1996) and the National Land Transport Act, 2009 (Act 5 of 2009), which regulate the traffic offences and applicable penalties, including the impounding of vehicles.

src: Cabinet has directed the Minister of Transport, Ms Sindisiwe Chikunga, to ensure that any taxi operating conditions that contradicts the laws of the Republic are removed.
tgt: Cabinet has directed the Minister of Transport, Ms Sindisiwe Chikunga, to ensure that any taxi operating conditions that contradicts the laws of the Republic are removed.

src: Fight against illegal mining.
tgt: Fight against illegal mining.

src: Cabinet welcomed the deployment of a special police unit, which is supported by the military, in Riverlea, Johannesburg, to deal with illegal mining in the area.
tgt: Cabinet welcomed the deployment of a special police unit, which is supported by the military, in Riverlea, Johannesburg, to deal with illegal mining in the area.

src: In addition, Cabinet commended the arrest of over 194 suspects over illegal mining activities and directed law-enforcement agencies to urgently clamp down on this and other serious crimes in the country.
tgt: In addition, Cabinet commended the arrest of over 194 suspects over illegal mining activities and directed law-enforcement agencies to urgently clamp down on this and other serious crimes in the country.

src: The Department of Mineral Resources and Energy (DMRE) has committed to close all derelict open shafts and mine holes in Riverlea by the end of September 2023, whilst finalising plans to close other derelict open shafts and mining holes across the country.
tgt: The Department of Mineral Resources and Energy (DMRE) has committed to close all derelict open shafts and mine holes in Riverlea by the end of September 2023, whilst finalising plans to close other derelict open shafts and mining holes across the country.

src: The security situation in Niger.
tgt: The security situation in Niger.

src: Cabinet has noted the impact the security situation in Niger is having on air-travel between South Africa/Southern Africa and Western Europe, with negative implications for business and individuals alike and the airline industry that is just starting to recover from the devastating ravages of the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic.
tgt: Cabinet has noted the impact the security situation in Niger is having on air-travel between South Africa/Southern Africa and Western Europe, with negative implications for business and individuals alike and the airline industry that is just starting to recover from the devastating ravages of the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic.

src: Cabinet reiterated government’s condemnation of the coup in Niger and the call for the speedy restoration of a democratic order, and also noted the initiative to restore normality under the Economic Community of West African States.
tgt: Cabinet reiterated government’s condemnation of the coup in Niger and the call for the speedy restoration of a democratic order, and also noted the initiative to restore normality under the Economic Community of West African States.

src: Russia-Africa Summit.
tgt: Russia-Africa Summit.

src: President Cyril Ramaphosa was amongst other African leaders who attended the Second Russia-Africa Summit, in St Petersburg in the Russian Federation on 27 and 28 July 2023.
tgt: President Cyril Ramaphosa was amongst other African leaders who attended the Second Russia-Africa Summit, in St Petersburg in the Russian Federation on 27 and 28 July 2023.

src: This summit adopted the Russia-Africa Partnership Forum Action Plan which focuses on strengthening cooperation in areas of politics and security, economics, humanitarian matters, and interests of mutual benefit and prosperity.
tgt: This summit adopted the Russia-Africa Partnership Forum Action Plan which focuses on strengthening cooperation in areas of politics and security, economics, humanitarian matters, and interests of mutual benefit and prosperity.

src: On the sidelines of the summit, African Heads of State and Government who are part of the African Peace Initiative on the conflict between Russia and Ukraine held follow-up talks with President Vladimir Putin on the previously discussed confidence-building measures that will create conditions for a negotiated settlement to ending the war.
tgt: On the sidelines of the summit, African Heads of State and Government who are part of the African Peace Initiative on the conflict between Russia and Ukraine held follow-up talks with President Vladimir Putin on the previously discussed confidence-building measures that will create conditions for a negotiated settlement to ending the war.

src: Presidents Ramaphosa and Putin also held a bilateral meeting and discussed opportunities to increase trade between the two countries, and for the Russian Federation to increase investments in South Africa.
tgt: Presidents Ramaphosa and Putin also held a bilateral meeting and discussed opportunities to increase trade between the two countries, and for the Russian Federation to increase investments in South Africa.

src: BRICS Summit Hosting Readiness.
tgt: BRICS Summit Hosting Readiness.

src: Cabinet was apprised that it is all systems go in terms of South Africa’s readiness to host the 15th BRICS Summit in Johannesburg from 22 to 24 August 2023.
tgt: Cabinet was apprised that it is all systems go in terms of South Africa’s readiness to host the 15th BRICS Summit in Johannesburg from 22 to 24 August 2023.

src: The last of the BRICS Ministerial meetings – the BRICS Ministers of Agriculture Meeting – is currently underway, while the Ministerial Meetings of Foreign Affairs, Security, Trade, Industry, Education, Science, Labour, Communications, Health, and Urbanisation Forum have concluded their reports for the Leaders’ Summit.
tgt: The last of the BRICS Ministerial meetings – the BRICS Ministers of Agriculture Meeting – is currently underway, while the Ministerial Meetings of Foreign Affairs, Security, Trade, Industry, Education, Science, Labour, Communications, Health, and Urbanisation Forum have concluded their reports for the Leaders’ Summit.

src: The BRICS Outreach programmes for various sectors and communities have also been concluded.
tgt: The BRICS Outreach programmes for various sectors and communities have also been concluded.

src: These engagements provided governments, organisations, experts and academics from the BRICS nations an opportunity to discuss issues of mutual interest that will enable informed decision-making during the BRICS Summit.
tgt: These engagements provided governments, organisations, experts and academics from the BRICS nations an opportunity to discuss issues of mutual interest that will enable informed decision-making during the BRICS Summit.

src: National Development Plan (NDP) Ten-Year Review.
tgt: National Development Plan (NDP) Ten-Year Review.

src: Cabinet welcomed the Ten-Year Review of the NDP by the National Planning Commission that pointed out that the economy remained structured in a manner that does not serve the interests of all South Africans, which is a major reason behind increasing levels of poverty and inequality.
tgt: Cabinet welcomed the Ten-Year Review of the NDP by the National Planning Commission that pointed out that the economy remained structured in a manner that does not serve the interests of all South Africans, which is a major reason behind increasing levels of poverty and inequality.

src: Government remains committed to restructuring and transforming the economy to serve the interests of all South Africans.
tgt: Government remains committed to restructuring and transforming the economy to serve the interests of all South Africans.

src: Energy.
tgt: Energy.

src: The 25th July marked the First Anniversary since President Ramaphosa announced the Energy Action Plan.
tgt: The 25th July marked the First Anniversary since President Ramaphosa announced the Energy Action Plan.

src: Cabinet welcomed the progress made to date to implement the Energy Action Plan, which continues to register an improvement in the Energy Availability Factor and improvement in the stages of load-shedding.
tgt: Cabinet welcomed the progress made to date to implement the Energy Action Plan, which continues to register an improvement in the Energy Availability Factor and improvement in the stages of load-shedding.

src: Tourism Cabinet is pleased that the Tourism statistics for June 2023 show that our tourism sector is slowly but surely recovering from the devastating effects of the COVID-19 pandemic.
tgt: Tourism Cabinet is pleased that the Tourism statistics for June 2023 show that our tourism sector is slowly but surely recovering from the devastating effects of the COVID-19 pandemic.

src: The June 2023 statistics from Statistics South Africa (Stats SA) show that the volume of arrivals, departures and travellers in transit increased for both South African residents and foreign travellers between June 2022 and June 2023.
tgt: The June 2023 statistics from Statistics South Africa (Stats SA) show that the volume of arrivals, departures and travellers in transit increased for both South African residents and foreign travellers between June 2022 and June 2023.

src: Economy Cabinet welcomed Stats SA’s report of a drop in consumer inflation from per cent in May to per cent in June 2023, which is the largest decline since May 2020.
tgt: Economy Cabinet welcomed Stats SA’s report of a drop in consumer inflation from per cent in May to per cent in June 2023, which is the largest decline since May 2020.

src: This drop shows the resilience of our economy, which has been further buoyed by the South Africa Reserve Bank’s decision to leave the repo rate unchanged at 8.25 per cent.
tgt: This drop shows the resilience of our economy, which has been further buoyed by the South Africa Reserve Bank’s decision to leave the repo rate unchanged at 8.25 per cent.

src: South African Sign Language (SASL) Bill.
tgt: South African Sign Language (SASL) Bill.

src: Cabinet welcomed the recent signing into law of the SASL Bill by President Ramaphosa, which made the SASL the 12th official language in South Africa.
tgt: Cabinet welcomed the recent signing into law of the SASL Bill by President Ramaphosa, which made the SASL the 12th official language in South Africa.

src: This will promote the rights of about 600 000 SASL users in South Africa.
tgt: This will promote the rights of about 600 000 SASL users in South Africa.

src: Cabinet Decisions.
tgt: Cabinet Decisions.

src: Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2023/24 financial year Cabinet approved the pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2023/24 financial year.
tgt: Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2023/24 financial year Cabinet approved the pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2023/24 financial year.

src: The crime statistics will be released in August and November 2023 for quarters one and two, and February and May 2024 for quarter three and quarter four respectively.
tgt: The crime statistics will be released in August and November 2023 for quarters one and two, and February and May 2024 for quarter three and quarter four respectively.

src: The frequent release of crime statistics is important for monitoring crime trends and better decision-making in the fight against crime.
tgt: The frequent release of crime statistics is important for monitoring crime trends and better decision-making in the fight against crime.

src: Financial Inclusion Policy Cabinet approved the Financial Inclusion Policy for implementation.
tgt: Financial Inclusion Policy Cabinet approved the Financial Inclusion Policy for implementation.

src: The policy forms part of government’s reforms of the financial sector regulations and in line with the Twin Peaks model of National Treasury.
tgt: The policy forms part of government’s reforms of the financial sector regulations and in line with the Twin Peaks model of National Treasury.

src: The policy, amongst others, aims to ensure better market conduct and the treatment of customers in the financial sector.
tgt: The policy, amongst others, aims to ensure better market conduct and the treatment of customers in the financial sector.

src: The purpose is to ensure that financial institutions conduct business in ways that are fair to customers, prevent practices that undermine the integrity of financial markets, and build confidence in the financial system.
tgt: The purpose is to ensure that financial institutions conduct business in ways that are fair to customers, prevent practices that undermine the integrity of financial markets, and build confidence in the financial system.

src: The implementation of the policy will ensure that the country strengthens its financial systems to support economic growth and promote access to financial services and financial inclusion for all citizens.
tgt: The implementation of the policy will ensure that the country strengthens its financial systems to support economic growth and promote access to financial services and financial inclusion for all citizens.

src: It is an acknowledgment that while levels of access have improved in transactional accounts, this has not reflected across many other financial products and services.
tgt: It is an acknowledgment that while levels of access have improved in transactional accounts, this has not reflected across many other financial products and services.

src: The policy is available on the National Treasury website: WEBTOKEN Bills.
tgt: The policy is available on the National Treasury website: WEBTOKEN Bills.

src: National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) Amendment Bill of 2023.
tgt: National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) Amendment Bill of 2023.

src: Cabinet approved the submission of the draft NPA Amendment Bill of 2023 to Parliament.
tgt: Cabinet approved the submission of the draft NPA Amendment Bill of 2023 to Parliament.

src: The Bill amends the NPA Act, 1998 (Act 32 of 1998) to provide for the establishment of the Investigating Directorate as a permanent entity within the NPA and to also strengthen its investigative powers.
tgt: The Bill amends the NPA Act, 1998 (Act 32 of 1998) to provide for the establishment of the Investigating Directorate as a permanent entity within the NPA and to also strengthen its investigative powers.

src: The Regulation of Interception of Communications and Provision of Communication-related Information Amendment Bill.
tgt: The Regulation of Interception of Communications and Provision of Communication-related Information Amendment Bill.

src: Cabinet approved the submission of the draft Amendment Bill to Parliament, which amends the Regulation of Communications and Provision of Communication-related Information Act (RICA), 2002 (Act 70 of 2002).
tgt: Cabinet approved the submission of the draft Amendment Bill to Parliament, which amends the Regulation of Communications and Provision of Communication-related Information Act (RICA), 2002 (Act 70 of 2002).

src: The amendments are largely to provide adequate safeguards to protect the right to privacy, as buttressed by the rights of access to courts, freedom of expression of the media and legal privilege in line with the 2021 Constitutional Court judgement that found the RICA of 2002 to be unconstitutional.
tgt: The amendments are largely to provide adequate safeguards to protect the right to privacy, as buttressed by the rights of access to courts, freedom of expression of the media and legal privilege in line with the 2021 Constitutional Court judgement that found the RICA of 2002 to be unconstitutional.
