src: Current Event.
tgt: Current Event.

src: Women’s Month.
tgt: Women’s Month.

src: South Africa is commemorating Women’s Month in August under the theme: “Accelerating socio-economic opportunities for empowerment of women” to pay tribute to the more than 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in 1956 to protest against the oppressive pass laws of the apartheid government.
tgt: South Africa is commemorating Women’s Month in August under the theme: “Accelerating socio-economic opportunities for empowerment of women” to pay tribute to the more than 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in 1956 to protest against the oppressive pass laws of the apartheid government.

src: Cabinet calls on South Africans to use the month not to only honour women who fought for our freedom but to also play our part to building a society that supports women empowerment and guarantees the safety of women and children.
tgt: Cabinet calls on South Africans to use the month not to only honour women who fought for our freedom but to also play our part to building a society that supports women empowerment and guarantees the safety of women and children.

src: Messages.
tgt: Messages.

src: CongratulationsCabinet extends its congratulations and well wishes to: Netball Spar Proteas, for making it to the top six in the Netball World Cup.
tgt: CongratulationsCabinet extends its congratulations and well wishes to: Netball Spar Proteas, for making it to the top six in the Netball World Cup.

src: Cabinet called on all South Africans to use such unifying moments as an opportunity to reach out to fellow South Africans to build social cohesions and promote nation-building in a society where everyone feels welcomeBanyana Banyana, for making history by advancing to the last 16 of the 2023 FIFA Women’s World Cup.
tgt: Cabinet called on all South Africans to use such unifying moments as an opportunity to reach out to fellow South Africans to build social cohesions and promote nation-building in a society where everyone feels welcomeBanyana Banyana, for making history by advancing to the last 16 of the 2023 FIFA Women’s World Cup.

src: Their incredible feats on the sporting field inspired the nation and they have flown the country’s flag high.
tgt: Their incredible feats on the sporting field inspired the nation and they have flown the country’s flag high.

src: Issues in the environment.
tgt: Issues in the environment.

src: BRICS XV Summit and the Johannesburg II Declaration South Africa hosted a successful BRICS XV Summit that adopted the historic Johannesburg II Declaration.
tgt: BRICS XV Summit and the Johannesburg II Declaration South Africa hosted a successful BRICS XV Summit that adopted the historic Johannesburg II Declaration.

src: Cabinet expressed its appreciation to Team South Africa ably led by our State President, His Excellency Cyril Matamela Ramaphosa who ensured the Summit was a great success at the level of both content and logistics.
tgt: Cabinet expressed its appreciation to Team South Africa ably led by our State President, His Excellency Cyril Matamela Ramaphosa who ensured the Summit was a great success at the level of both content and logistics.

src: The President will address the nation on the successful BRICS XV Summit and other important matters.
tgt: The President will address the nation on the successful BRICS XV Summit and other important matters.

src: State Visit by Chinese President South Africa hosted a State Visit of His Excellency, President Xi Jinping of the People’s Republic of China on Tuesday, 22 August 2023, ahead of the BRICS Summit.
tgt: State Visit by Chinese President South Africa hosted a State Visit of His Excellency, President Xi Jinping of the People’s Republic of China on Tuesday, 22 August 2023, ahead of the BRICS Summit.

src: The State Visit also marked the celebration of 25 years of diplomatic relations between the Republic of South Africa and the People’s Republic of China.
tgt: The State Visit also marked the celebration of 25 years of diplomatic relations between the Republic of South Africa and the People’s Republic of China.

src: The People’s Republic of China is currently South Africa’s largest trading partner.
tgt: The People’s Republic of China is currently South Africa’s largest trading partner.

src: The People’s Republic of China had previously donated emergency power equipment worth R167 million and have since made available a grant of R500 million for development assistance.
tgt: The People’s Republic of China had previously donated emergency power equipment worth R167 million and have since made available a grant of R500 million for development assistance.

src: Cabinet welcomed the signing of various Agreements and Memoranda of Understanding between the South African government and the People’s Republic of China in the areas of trade, energy, higher education.
tgt: Cabinet welcomed the signing of various Agreements and Memoranda of Understanding between the South African government and the People’s Republic of China in the areas of trade, energy, higher education.

src: Amongst the signed Agreements, it is the China-Africa Development Fund between the IDC and the Bank of China.
tgt: Amongst the signed Agreements, it is the China-Africa Development Fund between the IDC and the Bank of China.

src: This Fund will stimulate increased investments in South Africa.
tgt: This Fund will stimulate increased investments in South Africa.

src: Cabinet also welcomed the reopening of the Chinese market for the export of South African beef, in addition to the export of South African avocados to China.
tgt: Cabinet also welcomed the reopening of the Chinese market for the export of South African beef, in addition to the export of South African avocados to China.

src: These export opportunities will unlock new opportunities for our local producers including small scale farmers.
tgt: These export opportunities will unlock new opportunities for our local producers including small scale farmers.

src: South Africa is negotiating with BYD, the Chinese automaker and the world’s largest electric vehicle manufacturer for possible opening of a manufacturing plant in South Africa.
tgt: South Africa is negotiating with BYD, the Chinese automaker and the world’s largest electric vehicle manufacturer for possible opening of a manufacturing plant in South Africa.

src: This is in addition to the opening of the BAIC manufacturing plant (another Chinese automaker) in South Africa.
tgt: This is in addition to the opening of the BAIC manufacturing plant (another Chinese automaker) in South Africa.

src: Highlights of the Economy.
tgt: Highlights of the Economy.

src: Quarterly Labour Force Survey Cabinet welcomed the Quarterly Labour Force Survey results for quarter 2 as released by Statistics South Africa, which indicated a slight decrease in unemployment rate from 32.9% in the first quarter to 32.6% in the second quarter.
tgt: Quarterly Labour Force Survey Cabinet welcomed the Quarterly Labour Force Survey results for quarter 2 as released by Statistics South Africa, which indicated a slight decrease in unemployment rate from 32.9% in the first quarter to 32.6% in the second quarter.

src: Cabinet is also pleased with 154 000 new jobs were created in the second quarter, taking the number of employed persons to million.
tgt: Cabinet is also pleased with 154 000 new jobs were created in the second quarter, taking the number of employed persons to million.

src: This is the 7th quarter of consecutive gains in employment inching South Africa closer to pre-Covid-19 pandemic employment figure of million.
tgt: This is the 7th quarter of consecutive gains in employment inching South Africa closer to pre-Covid-19 pandemic employment figure of million.

src: Cabinet has also noted the green shoots with the reduction of youth unemployment by 131,000 and an increase of 105,000 in the number of employed youth to million.
tgt: Cabinet has also noted the green shoots with the reduction of youth unemployment by 131,000 and an increase of 105,000 in the number of employed youth to million.

src: Consumer Price Inflation (CPI)3.
tgt: Consumer Price Inflation (CPI)3.

src: Cabinet further welcomed reports by StatsSA that the annual Consumer Price inflation slowed to 4.7% in July 2023, from 5.4% in June The annual inflation rate for goods was 5.5% for July 2023 from 6.3% in June 2023, whereas the inflation rate for services was 4.0% down from 4.5% in the same period.
tgt: Cabinet further welcomed reports by StatsSA that the annual Consumer Price inflation slowed to 4.7% in July 2023, from 5.4% in June The annual inflation rate for goods was 5.5% for July 2023 from 6.3% in June 2023, whereas the inflation rate for services was 4.0% down from 4.5% in the same period.

src: Agro-Energy Fund to support agriculture and agribusinesses.
tgt: Agro-Energy Fund to support agriculture and agribusinesses.

src: On the 27th of August 2023, the Department of Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Development, collaboratively with the Land Bank, launched a R1,21 billion Agro-Energy Fund to support the agriculture and agribusiness sector to install alternative energy sources and continue with food, fibre and beverages production.
tgt: On the 27th of August 2023, the Department of Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Development, collaboratively with the Land Bank, launched a R1,21 billion Agro-Energy Fund to support the agriculture and agribusiness sector to install alternative energy sources and continue with food, fibre and beverages production.

src: The sector is one of the intensive energy users and critical for the stability of South Africa’s food security, export earnings and employment, thus making this government intervention vital to ensure sustainability.
tgt: The sector is one of the intensive energy users and critical for the stability of South Africa’s food security, export earnings and employment, thus making this government intervention vital to ensure sustainability.

src: The Fund is inclusive and will support farming businesses of all scales in a Blended Finance approach, with the Land Bank managing the Fund.
tgt: The Fund is inclusive and will support farming businesses of all scales in a Blended Finance approach, with the Land Bank managing the Fund.

src: The Fund will also include all agriculture and agribusiness activities that are energy intensive.
tgt: The Fund will also include all agriculture and agribusiness activities that are energy intensive.

src: Implementation of State Capture Commission recommendations The National Prosecuting Authority assets recovery is R.2 billion in the current MTEF period and R.55 billion of it is State Capture related.
tgt: Implementation of State Capture Commission recommendations The National Prosecuting Authority assets recovery is R.2 billion in the current MTEF period and R.55 billion of it is State Capture related.

src: Cabinet has approved and tabled in Parliament eight of the fourteen new legislative amendments identified in our implementation plan.
tgt: Cabinet has approved and tabled in Parliament eight of the fourteen new legislative amendments identified in our implementation plan.

src: Work also continues to ensure that those responsible for state capture are held to account.
tgt: Work also continues to ensure that those responsible for state capture are held to account.

src: Fight against crime, corruption and illegal immigration The latest Quarterly Crime Statistics show that we must do more as a society to tackle the scourge of crime.
tgt: Fight against crime, corruption and illegal immigration The latest Quarterly Crime Statistics show that we must do more as a society to tackle the scourge of crime.

src: Cabinet calls on everyone to join the fight and to work collectively to make our homes, places of work and public spaces safer for all.
tgt: Cabinet calls on everyone to join the fight and to work collectively to make our homes, places of work and public spaces safer for all.

src: Cabinet further welcomed the extension of the integrated crime-fighting “Operation Shanela” to other provinces, including the Northern Cape, Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt: Cabinet further welcomed the extension of the integrated crime-fighting “Operation Shanela” to other provinces, including the Northern Cape, Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Cabinet noted the recent guilty plea and sentencing of six men accused of killing anti-corruption whistleblower, Ms Babita Deokaran, in August 2021.
tgt: Cabinet noted the recent guilty plea and sentencing of six men accused of killing anti-corruption whistleblower, Ms Babita Deokaran, in August 2021.

src: It called on law-enforcement agencies to further investigate and ensure that masterminds behind the murder are brought to book.
tgt: It called on law-enforcement agencies to further investigate and ensure that masterminds behind the murder are brought to book.

src: Cabinet applauded the integrated approach in combating crime that recently led to the Department of Home Affairs intercepting 67 Pakistani nationals who tried to enter the country illegally at the OR Tambo International Airport on Sunday, 13 August 2023.
tgt: Cabinet applauded the integrated approach in combating crime that recently led to the Department of Home Affairs intercepting 67 Pakistani nationals who tried to enter the country illegally at the OR Tambo International Airport on Sunday, 13 August 2023.

src: Transforming MENtalities Summit 2023.
tgt: Transforming MENtalities Summit 2023.

src: The recently concluded Transforming MENtalities Summit has left an indelible mark on 1500 attendees, with its powerful engagement and insightful discussions poised to pave the way for transformation needs for men and boy behavior.
tgt: The recently concluded Transforming MENtalities Summit has left an indelible mark on 1500 attendees, with its powerful engagement and insightful discussions poised to pave the way for transformation needs for men and boy behavior.

src: Held at the Birchwood Hotel and OR Tambo Conference Centre, the summit brought together University Vice-Chancellors, Deans, Principals and Council Chairpersons of TVET Colleges, Student Support Structures and Leadership, CEOs of SETAs, entities of the Departments of Higher Education and Science and Innovation, policymakers, survivors, peer educators, and change-makers, all unified by a shared commitment to addressing Gender-Based Violence (GBV) within the Post-School Education and Training (PSET) sector.
tgt: Held at the Birchwood Hotel and OR Tambo Conference Centre, the summit brought together University Vice-Chancellors, Deans, Principals and Council Chairpersons of TVET Colleges, Student Support Structures and Leadership, CEOs of SETAs, entities of the Departments of Higher Education and Science and Innovation, policymakers, survivors, peer educators, and change-makers, all unified by a shared commitment to addressing Gender-Based Violence (GBV) within the Post-School Education and Training (PSET) sector.

src: The Summit was hosted by HIGHER HEALTH and the Human Science Research Council (HSRC) on behalf of the Department of Higher Education and Training and the Department of Science and Innovation.
tgt: The Summit was hosted by HIGHER HEALTH and the Human Science Research Council (HSRC) on behalf of the Department of Higher Education and Training and the Department of Science and Innovation.

src: The aim was to engage the sector leadership, on transforming mentalities and address the root causes of GBEvidence and data suggest that men behavior has been one of the root causes of GBV and the Summit called for action for men and boys towards being part of the solution.
tgt: The aim was to engage the sector leadership, on transforming mentalities and address the root causes of GBEvidence and data suggest that men behavior has been one of the root causes of GBV and the Summit called for action for men and boys towards being part of the solution.

src: The summit asked for the development of more peer educators and champions across all our campuses, to work as change agents towards transforming MENtalities, more men dialogues across all institutions, incorporating gender studies including GBV, gender equality, gender diversity and transforming MENtalities as co-curriculum alongside the main curriculum in the Post-School Education and Training (PSET) sector.
tgt: The summit asked for the development of more peer educators and champions across all our campuses, to work as change agents towards transforming MENtalities, more men dialogues across all institutions, incorporating gender studies including GBV, gender equality, gender diversity and transforming MENtalities as co-curriculum alongside the main curriculum in the Post-School Education and Training (PSET) sector.

src: Electricity Cabinet received an update on electricity situation in the country and noted reports of the continued improvement in electricity availability Although the last few days had recorded an increase in the load shedding stages to stage 4, the situation has since improved with the return of units to generation, and Eskom continues to taper down the load shedding stages.
tgt: Electricity Cabinet received an update on electricity situation in the country and noted reports of the continued improvement in electricity availability Although the last few days had recorded an increase in the load shedding stages to stage 4, the situation has since improved with the return of units to generation, and Eskom continues to taper down the load shedding stages.

src: Cabinet was briefed that there are communities that have no electricity due to power outages and not load shedding.
tgt: Cabinet was briefed that there are communities that have no electricity due to power outages and not load shedding.

src: These power outages are caused by system overload due to illegal connections, theft or vandalism of sub-stations and transformers, and vandalism of distribution lines.
tgt: These power outages are caused by system overload due to illegal connections, theft or vandalism of sub-stations and transformers, and vandalism of distribution lines.

src: The affected communities include those in parts of Soweto, parts of Thembisa, Kwa-Thema, Komane, Taung md Ditsobotla.
tgt: The affected communities include those in parts of Soweto, parts of Thembisa, Kwa-Thema, Komane, Taung md Ditsobotla.

src: The Minister of Electricity and the Department of COGTA have commenced with a programme to engage with the affected communities to agree on measures that will allow the replacement of damaged infrastructure but linked with the prohibition of illegal connections, community partnerships in the protection if electricity infrastructure, and payment for electricity service.
tgt: The Minister of Electricity and the Department of COGTA have commenced with a programme to engage with the affected communities to agree on measures that will allow the replacement of damaged infrastructure but linked with the prohibition of illegal connections, community partnerships in the protection if electricity infrastructure, and payment for electricity service.

src: South Africa’s Agreement with the Chinese companies, on recently signed agreements, will play a significant role in introducing electricity infrastructure with self preservation capability.
tgt: South Africa’s Agreement with the Chinese companies, on recently signed agreements, will play a significant role in introducing electricity infrastructure with self preservation capability.

src: Western Cape Provincial Powers Bill.1 Cabinet was briefed about the unconstitutional draft Western Cape Provincial Powers Bill.2 The Draft Bill violates the provisions of Schedules 4 and 5 of the Constitution that set out powers and functions including concurrent powers of both the provincial and National executives.
tgt: Western Cape Provincial Powers Bill.1 Cabinet was briefed about the unconstitutional draft Western Cape Provincial Powers Bill.2 The Draft Bill violates the provisions of Schedules 4 and 5 of the Constitution that set out powers and functions including concurrent powers of both the provincial and National executives.

src: Cabinet has noted that this draft Bill is an attempt to revert back to the Democratic Party’s (forerunner to the Democratic Alliance) preferred federal approach that seeks to undermine a United and inclusive South Africa.4 It is noteworthy that WC draft Bill ignores the exclusion from access to services of the large black communities of Khayelitsha, Gugulethu, Nyanga, Langa, the Cape Flats, Delft, Central Line, amongst others Cabinet has mandated the Ministers of Justice and COGTA to enter into discussions with the Western Cape provincial government in line with the relevant dispute resolution mechanisms as provided for in section 146 of the Constitution and the applicable intergovernmental framework.
tgt: Cabinet has noted that this draft Bill is an attempt to revert back to the Democratic Party’s (forerunner to the Democratic Alliance) preferred federal approach that seeks to undermine a United and inclusive South Africa.4 It is noteworthy that WC draft Bill ignores the exclusion from access to services of the large black communities of Khayelitsha, Gugulethu, Nyanga, Langa, the Cape Flats, Delft, Central Line, amongst others Cabinet has mandated the Ministers of Justice and COGTA to enter into discussions with the Western Cape provincial government in line with the relevant dispute resolution mechanisms as provided for in section 146 of the Constitution and the applicable intergovernmental framework.

src: Cabinet decisions Extension of the Taxi Relief Fund disbursement Cabinet approved the extension period for the disbursement of the Taxi Relief Fund for another 12 months.
tgt: Cabinet decisions Extension of the Taxi Relief Fund disbursement Cabinet approved the extension period for the disbursement of the Taxi Relief Fund for another 12 months.

src: The extension will provide the Department of Transport sufficient time to assist the many taxi operators who are yet to receive the relief funds.
tgt: The extension will provide the Department of Transport sufficient time to assist the many taxi operators who are yet to receive the relief funds.

src: To date, 88 580 taxi operators have been assisted.
tgt: To date, 88 580 taxi operators have been assisted.

src: The fund was established to assist minibus taxis, cabs and e-hailing drivers who were financially disadvantaged during the Coronavirus Disease hard lockdowns, in line with stipulated criteria.
tgt: The fund was established to assist minibus taxis, cabs and e-hailing drivers who were financially disadvantaged during the Coronavirus Disease hard lockdowns, in line with stipulated criteria.

src: Green Paper on the Development of Tourism in South Africa Cabinet approved the publication of the Green Paper on the Development of Tourism in South Africa for public comments.
tgt: Green Paper on the Development of Tourism in South Africa Cabinet approved the publication of the Green Paper on the Development of Tourism in South Africa for public comments.

src: The policy seeks to develop and promote tourism in South Africa, and address barriers to tourism growth.
tgt: The policy seeks to develop and promote tourism in South Africa, and address barriers to tourism growth.

src: The policy will promote rural and peri-urban tourism by encouraging the profiling and visibility of rural products.
tgt: The policy will promote rural and peri-urban tourism by encouraging the profiling and visibility of rural products.

src: Policy proposals also focus on tourism governance and cooperation safety and security management transformation and embracing technology, amongst others.
tgt: Policy proposals also focus on tourism governance and cooperation safety and security management transformation and embracing technology, amongst others.

src: Members of the public have 60 days to make comments on the policy.
tgt: Members of the public have 60 days to make comments on the policy.

src: The Green Paper is available on WEBTOKENational Policy on Theatre and Dance.1 Cabinet approved the National Policy on Theatre and Dance.
tgt: The Green Paper is available on WEBTOKENational Policy on Theatre and Dance.1 Cabinet approved the National Policy on Theatre and Dance.

src: The policy seeks to address the historically institutionalised inequalities and disparities, which follow racial and economic access lines in theatre and dance.2 The policy aims to set a vision and practical policies, strategies, implementation mechanisms and time frames that will result in a sustainable and vibrant theatre and dance sector in all nine provinces, with South African dance and theatre makers representing the country with pride continentally and globally.
tgt: The policy seeks to address the historically institutionalised inequalities and disparities, which follow racial and economic access lines in theatre and dance.2 The policy aims to set a vision and practical policies, strategies, implementation mechanisms and time frames that will result in a sustainable and vibrant theatre and dance sector in all nine provinces, with South African dance and theatre makers representing the country with pride continentally and globally.

src: Essential Food Price Monitoring Reports.1 The Competition Commission has been monitoring essential food prices pursuant to price gouging concerns raised since the declaration of the State of Disaster in March 2020.
tgt: Essential Food Price Monitoring Reports.1 The Competition Commission has been monitoring essential food prices pursuant to price gouging concerns raised since the declaration of the State of Disaster in March 2020.

src: The continuation of essential food price monitoring is motivated by the need to ensure affordable and accessible essential food products for consumers.
tgt: The continuation of essential food price monitoring is motivated by the need to ensure affordable and accessible essential food products for consumers.

src: The Commission has noted the ‘rocket and feather’ effect, where prices are quick to rise often in excess of cost increases and slow to fall once cost pressures decline.
tgt: The Commission has noted the ‘rocket and feather’ effect, where prices are quick to rise often in excess of cost increases and slow to fall once cost pressures decline.

src: It has also flagged the concentrated nature of the food and retail markets as a concerning contributing factor.
tgt: It has also flagged the concentrated nature of the food and retail markets as a concerning contributing factor.

src: The Cabinet has noted the Commission’s recommended measures including market inquiries to address structural features in the market that lead to high food prices and low levels of competition.
tgt: The Cabinet has noted the Commission’s recommended measures including market inquiries to address structural features in the market that lead to high food prices and low levels of competition.

src: Cabinet has approved that the Economic Cluster must put in place an action plan on food prices, food secure and access to food.
tgt: Cabinet has approved that the Economic Cluster must put in place an action plan on food prices, food secure and access to food.

src: Appointments All appointments are subject to the verification of qualifications and relevant clearance.
tgt: Appointments All appointments are subject to the verification of qualifications and relevant clearance.

src: Ms Nosiphiwo Mzamo as the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the State Diamond Trader.
tgt: Ms Nosiphiwo Mzamo as the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the State Diamond Trader.

src: Mr Loyiso Tyabashe as the CEO of the South African Nuclear Energy Corporation (reappointment).
tgt: Mr Loyiso Tyabashe as the CEO of the South African Nuclear Energy Corporation (reappointment).

src: Appointment of Non-Executive members to serve on the Ports Regulator Board for a period of three years.1 Mr Aubrey Ngcobo as the Chairperson.2 Ms Lauriette Lynne Sesoko.3 Adv.
tgt: Appointment of Non-Executive members to serve on the Ports Regulator Board for a period of three years.1 Mr Aubrey Ngcobo as the Chairperson.2 Ms Lauriette Lynne Sesoko.3 Adv.

tgt: Derrick Jeffrey Block.4 Ms Thembela Beryl Taboshe.5 Mr Abdul Qadir Chogle.6 Dr Percy Derrick Manzini.7 Ms Princess Mangoma Ms Sizakele Makhanya.9 Ms Ntebaleng Rolland Setlako.10 Ms Marcia Xolisile Mkhari.11 Ms Leanda Marsha Mtshali – re-appointment.

src: Heritage Month.
tgt: Heritage Month.

src: Heritage month will be celebrated under the theme: “Celebrating our cultural diversity in a democratic South Africa”.
tgt: Heritage month will be celebrated under the theme: “Celebrating our cultural diversity in a democratic South Africa”.

src: Communities are urged to use Heritage Month in September to unite our nation, as we celebrate our nation’s rich heritage and diversity.
tgt: Communities are urged to use Heritage Month in September to unite our nation, as we celebrate our nation’s rich heritage and diversity.

src: Public Service Month (PSM).
tgt: Public Service Month (PSM).

src: The Public Service will celebrate PSM between 1 and 30 September 2023.
tgt: The Public Service will celebrate PSM between 1 and 30 September 2023.

src: The month serves as a reminder of what it is to serve, and offers us an opportunity to reflect on how public servants can impact and change the lives of communities.
tgt: The month serves as a reminder of what it is to serve, and offers us an opportunity to reflect on how public servants can impact and change the lives of communities.

src: Thusong Service Centre Week This year’s Annual Thusong Service Centre Week will take place from 18 to 22 September 2023.
tgt: Thusong Service Centre Week This year’s Annual Thusong Service Centre Week will take place from 18 to 22 September 2023.

src: South Africans are invited to explore the array of services offered at their local Thusong Service Centre, which is a one-stop service point that brings government information and services closer to people.
tgt: South Africans are invited to explore the array of services offered at their local Thusong Service Centre, which is a one-stop service point that brings government information and services closer to people.

src: National Police Commemoration Day In honour of our heroes and heroines who passed away in the line of duty, the South African Police Service’s National Commemoration Day will be held at the Union Buildings on Sunday, 3 September 2023.
tgt: National Police Commemoration Day In honour of our heroes and heroines who passed away in the line of duty, the South African Police Service’s National Commemoration Day will be held at the Union Buildings on Sunday, 3 September 2023.

src: The National Flag will be flown at half-mast on the day of the event.
tgt: The National Flag will be flown at half-mast on the day of the event.

src: Messages.
tgt: Messages.

src: CongratulationsCabinet extends its congratulations and well-wishes to: Ms Natasha Joubert, the newly crowned Miss South Africa 2023, as she embarks on her reign as Miss South Africa.
tgt: CongratulationsCabinet extends its congratulations and well-wishes to: Ms Natasha Joubert, the newly crowned Miss South Africa 2023, as she embarks on her reign as Miss South Africa.

src: Mr Brad Binder, who finished second at the Austrian MotoGThe Springboks for beating the All Blacks and wished them well in the forthcoming Rugby World CupIndia, for becoming the first country to successfully land a spacecraft near the south pole of the moon.
tgt: Mr Brad Binder, who finished second at the Austrian MotoGThe Springboks for beating the All Blacks and wished them well in the forthcoming Rugby World CupIndia, for becoming the first country to successfully land a spacecraft near the south pole of the moon.

src: Zimbabwe elections.
tgt: Zimbabwe elections.

src: Cabinet congratulated the people of Zimbabwe for exercising their democratic right to vote and reiterated its commitment to work with Zimbabwe in strengthening the region and the continent.
tgt: Cabinet congratulated the people of Zimbabwe for exercising their democratic right to vote and reiterated its commitment to work with Zimbabwe in strengthening the region and the continent.

src: Condolences Cabinet expressed condolences to the family and friends of: Mr Derek Watts (74), the veteran television (TV) host and journalist who will be remembered as the face of the Carte Blanche TV series and for his dedication to investigative journalism.
tgt: Condolences Cabinet expressed condolences to the family and friends of: Mr Derek Watts (74), the veteran television (TV) host and journalist who will be remembered as the face of the Carte Blanche TV series and for his dedication to investigative journalism.

src: Ms Sylvia Ncediwe Mdunyelwa, the jazz singer and actor, who worked with the late Victor Ntoni and the Ngcukana brothers, Winston Mankuku, Nick Carter and Merton Barrow.
tgt: Ms Sylvia Ncediwe Mdunyelwa, the jazz singer and actor, who worked with the late Victor Ntoni and the Ngcukana brothers, Winston Mankuku, Nick Carter and Merton Barrow.

src: Mengameli Recep Tayyip Erdoğan we-Türkiye malungana nokuqiniswa kobudlelwano hlangana kweSewula Afrika ne-Turkey, nokubikelana ngamagadango wokuthula ngepi hlangana kwe-Russia ne-Ukraine.
tgt: Presidente Recep Tayyip Erdoğan wa le Türkiye, eka ku tiyisisa vuxaka exikarhi ka Afrika-Dzonga na Turkey, na ku tivisana hi migingiriko ya ku rhula eka mpfilumpfilu lowu nga kona exikarhi ka Russia na Ukraine.

src: Mengameli Bola Tinubu we-Federal Republic of Nigeria, malungana nokuqiniswa kobudlelwano hlangana kweSewula Afrika ne-Nigeria.
tgt: President Bola Tinubu wa Rhiphabliki ra Federali ra Nigeria, eka ku tiyisa vuxaka exikarhi ka Afrika-Dzonga na Nigeria.

src: Mengameli Emmerson Mnangagwa we-Riphabhligi ye-Zimbabwe, ngamagadango karhulumende we-Zimbabwe wokuhlanganisa amahlelo wokuvuselela ilizwe le-Zimbabwe ngemva kwekhetho lakhona elisandukudlula.
tgt: Presidente Emmerson Mnangagwa wa Rhiphabliki ra Zimbabwe, eka migingiriko ya mfumo wa Zimbabwe yo hlanganisa ku akiwa hi vuntshwa ka tiko leriya endzhaku ka nhlawulo lowa ha ku vaka kona lowu ku pfumelelaniweke hawona.4 President Ramaphosa u tlhele a nghenelela eka Nhlangeletano yo Tshama va Vulavula hi Bindzu ra Mabindzu na Vuvekisi ya United States (US)-Afrika-Dzonga, lowu a wu katsa varhangeri va Bindzu va Afrika-Dzonga na Amerika.

src: Ukubuyela ekusebenzeni kweZiko 4 lePhawa yeKusile ngemva kokulungiswa kwalo njengoba bekuhleliwe kubuyise umthamo wegezi oma-800 wama-megawatt ethungelelwaneni legezi yelizwe.
tgt: Ku vuyela eku tirheni ka Yuniti ya 4 ya Xitichi xa Gezi xa Kusile ku suka eka ku lulamisa ka nhlayiso lowu kunguhatiweke swi vuyisile 800 wa ti megawati eka giridi ya hina ya gezi.

src: Senzo Mchunu nabomeyara besigungu kamanye wamadrobha amakhulu e-Gauteng bazakubika ngokwenzeka mvanje ngamagadango aragako athathelwa ukunzinzisa umsebenzi wokuphakelwa kwamanzi esifundenesi.
tgt: Holobye wa mati na Mbhasiso, Tatana Senzo Mchunu na vameyarankulu va madoroba man’wana eGauteng va ta nyika hungu leri pfuxetiweke ra ku nghenelela loku yaka emahlweni ku tiyisisa mphakelo wa mati eka xifundzankulu.

src: IKhabinethi ithanda ukukhumbuza woke umuntu ukuthi iSewula Afrika ililizwe elitlhayelelwa mamanzi.
tgt: Khabinete yi tsundzuxa munhu un’wana na un’wana leswaku Afrika-Dzonga i tiko leri kayivelaka mati.

src: Woke amaSewula Afrika nabo boke abanye abantu abakilelilizwe kumele balonde babe basebenzise amanzi ngokuwababalela.
tgt: MaAfrika-Dzonga hinkwavo na munhu un’wana na un’wana loyi a nga laha tikweni leri u fanele ku hlayisa na ku tirhisa mati hi vukheta.

src: I-BNC izakusebenza ngeendaba zobudlelwano babosomaqhinga/babazenda, zobujoni nokuvikeleka, zamanzi, zokuthutha, zegezi kunye nezerhwebo.
tgt: Khabinete yi bumabumerile ntirho wa khomixini wo lulamisa swivilelo swa vulawuri bya vun’we eka tipulatifomo ta vuhlanganisi bya dijitali, ku katsa khomese, tiejensi ta marendzo ta le ka inthanete, ku phakeriwa ka swakudya, switolo swa ti-app, vanyiki va swilo leswi hlawuriweke na tindhawu to secha mahungu.2 Khabinete yi lerisile Vaholobye va tindzawulo ta mfumo leti faneleke ku ya emahlweni va hlangana va ta na switsundzuxo swo antswisa, ku langutisisa switandzhaku swa pholisi na ku endla ku cinca ka pholisi loku lavekaka loku nga ta olovisa ku nghenelela loku twisisekaka ka MaAfrika-Dzonga na mabindzu lamatsongo, ya le xikarhi na lamatsongo swinene eka bindzu ra le ka inthanete leri kulaka.6 Mukhuhlwana wa Swinyenyana.1 Khabinete yi lemukile mitungu ya nkarhi wa sweswi ya chachalaza leyi vangaka mavabyi swinene (HPAI) H5 na H7 eka indhasitiri ya tihuku eAfrika-Dzonga.

src: Iphenyo Ngeemakethe Ekundleni Yokulamula Ku-Inthanethi IKhabinethi yethulelwe umbiko yiKomitjhini yezePhaliswano ngalokho okutholwe liPhenyo ngeeMakethe eKundleni yokuLamula ku-Inthanethi nangeemphakamiso zokulungisa ekumele kulungiswe kilokho okutholwe liphenyo.
tgt: KapaVupeladyambu na KwaZulu-Natal swi vile na mitungu ya HPAI H5 kasi HPAI H7 yi vikiwile eka swifundzankulu swa Gauteng, Limpopo, Mpumalanga na North West.

src: IKhabinethi iwubukile umsebenzi weKomitjhini ngokukhuluma ngeenghonghoyilo zokukhonya eenkundleni zokulamula nge-inthanethi, ekubalwa hlangana nakho nokuthengiselana nge-inthanethi, iinthunywa ezilungisela amakhambo wabantu nge-inthanethi, ukulethwa kokugoma eentolo nebantwini, iintolo zeensetjenziswa zamaselifoni, abondli abakhethekileko kunye neensetjenziswa zekhomphyutha ekufunwa ngazo imininingwana.
tgt: Magoza yo lawula ku hangalaka ka mavabyi ya kona naswona van’wamapurasi va khutaziwa ku landzelela magoza lama vekiweke yo sirhelela swilo leswi hanyaka.2 Mitungu leyi yi tisa mixungeto ya nsirhelelo wa swakudya naswona ku nga tirhisiwa magoza ya mabindzu hi ndlela yo xava swilo leswi humaka ematikweni ya le handle ku lawula ku kumeka ka matandza yo nona, matandza ya le tafuleni na nyama ya huku.

src: ITjingalanga Kapa neKwaZulu-Natala zehlelwe yi-HPAI H5 kanti-ke ngahlanye kubikwe bona i-HPAI H7 yehle esifundeni se-Gauteng, nese-Limpopo, neseMpumalanga kunye neTlhagwini Tjingalanga.
tgt: Khabinete yi tshama yi ri karhi yi tivisiwa hi ku onhaka loku vangiwaka hi swidzedze leswikulu na ndhambi eKapaVuxa, KapaVupeladyambu na Gauteng, ku ri na swikombiso swa leswaku leswi swi nga endleka swi hangalaka na swifundzha leswin’wana.3 Khabinete yi kombela miganga ku tshama yi vambe ngoma eka switsundzuxo swin’wana swa maxelo yo biha, leswi nga tisaka ku onhaka kun’wana etikweni hinkwaro.4 Mfumo wu ya emahlweni wu seketela vukorhokeri bya xihatla na tisenthara ta vulawuri bya timhangu eka matirho yo ponisa na ku nyika nseketelo wo phalala eka swiyimo swa xihatla.9 Winnie Mandela Avenue.1 Khabinete yi lemukile ku cinciwa ka vito ra William Nicol Drive eSandton ku va Winnie Mandela Avenue tanihi goza ra nkoka ro tsala matimu ya Afrika-Dzonga hi vuntshwa ku kombisa ku hoxa xandla ka lava nga lwela ntshunxeko wa hina.2 Ntirho lowu wu kotlanile na siku leri a ri ta va ri ri ra ku velekiwa ka Winnie Madikizela-Mandela ra vu 87 hi ti 26 ndzati 2023.

src: Ezingundabamlonyeni Iinkutani zeBhigiri yePhasi kaMakhakhulararhwe yomnyaka wee-2023 Ikhabinethi yethulele ama-Springboks ingwani ngokuthumba kwawo iBhigiri yePhasi kaMakhakhulararhwe yomnyaka wee-2023 eyenze iSewula Afrika yaba lilizwe ekungilo kwaphela elithumbe iBhigiri yePhasi kaMakhakhulararhwe amahlandla amane begodu yaba ngeyesibili ukuthumba ithayitlela le iminyaka emibili elandelanako.
tgt: Timhaka leti nga eka Mbango Tinghwazi ta Khapu ya Misava ya Rugby ya 2023 Khabinete yi hoyozerile tiSpringboks eka ku hlula ka vona eka Khapu ya Misava ya Rugby 2023 loku endleke Afrika-Dzonga tiko ri ri roxe ri nga hlula Khapu ya Misava ya Rugby ku ringana ka mune (4) no va ra vumbiri ku wina xidlodlo hi ku landzelelana.

src: Emlandweni kamakhakhulararhwe eSewula Afrika, isiqhemesi sama-Springboks kusiqhema esihlukene khulu ngokujameleka kweendawo zeSewula Afrika.
tgt: Eka matimu ya Rugby eAfrika-Dzonga, xipano xa tiSpringboks hi xona lexi nga na vanhu vo hambanahambana hikuya hi nhlayo ya vaaki va Afrika-Dzonga.

src: Ukubumbeka kwesiqhema esihlukene ngaleyondlela bekungasiyo into ezenzakaleleko, kodwana bekumzamo wangabomu owenziwe baphathi nabasebenzi ababandulako bama-Springboks ukobana bakhethe isiqhema esijanyelwe babantu ngokuhlukahlukana kwabo.
tgt: Ku vumbiwa ka xipano xa tano lowu nga na vanhu vo hambanahambana a ku nga ri mhaka ya xiwelo, kambe i matshalatshala lama endliweke hi vufambisi na valeteri va tiSpringboks ku hlawula xipano lexi katsaka hinkwavo.

src: Isiqunto esinamandla esenziwa mbanduli wangaleso sikhathi u-Rassie Erasmus nesiqhema sakhe siragela phambili nokutjengisa amaSewula Afrika nephasi zombelele, bona woke umuntu unamakghonofundwa, nange anganikelwa ithuba begodu asekelwe, angaba mumuntu omkhulu – ekuyinto efakazela bona sinaMandla nasiBambeneko.
tgt: Xiboho xelexo xa vurhena lexi tekiweke hi nkarhi wolowo hi muleteri Rassie Erasmus na ntlawa wa yena va ya emahlweni va kombisa maAfrika-Dzonga na misava hinkwayo, leswaku un’wana na un’wana la nga na vuswikoti, loko a nyikiwa nkarhi na nseketelo, a nga va lonkulu - i ku tiyisisa leswaku hi na matimba loko hi ri swin’we.

src: Okuqakatheke khulu, ukuqina nokuzinikela kwama-Springboks etatawini lokudlala kulitshwayo lokuba mSewula Afrika wamambala, okungilokho okubumba isitjhaba esinamandlesi kibo boke ubudisi nokuhlukahlukana ekutheni sibe ziinkutani.
tgt: Xa nkoka swinene, ku tiyisela na ku tiyimisela ka tiSpringbok eka xivandla xa ntlangu i xikombiso xa xiviri xa ntiyiso xo va muAfrika-Dzonga, leswi endlaka leswaku tiko leri lerikulu ri lwisana na mintshikilelo hinkwayo ni maxangu leswaku ri va ni vun’we ri hlula.

src: Abanye babadlali abakhamba phambili balesi siqhema sama-Springboks kufuneke bona bangaqali ukuhluka kwabo ngokombala ukobana bafike endleleni eya epumelelweni.
tgt: Khabinete yi hoyozerile Siyamthanda “Siya” Kolisi, mukaputeni wa tiSpringboks loyi a hluleke Khapu ya Misava kambirhi ku va a rhangele xipano ku ya fika eka xiyimo xa (Greatest of All Time) Vukulu bya Minkarhi Hinkwayo (GOAT) naswona ku tlangela ku fanele ku ya emahlweni.

src: ISewula Afrika ihlome idrowunu engekulu e-Afrika IKhabinethi ibethulele ingwani bezeVikeleko nekhamphani yemkayini i-Milkor ngokuphumelela kwayo ukuhloma i-Milkor 380 ikoloyana yokuthaya (i-UAV), ebeka iSewula Afrika hlangana namazwe aragela phambili nokwenza imizamo kuthekhnoloji yamadrowuni.
tgt: Afrika-Dzonga yi simeka xihahampfhuka lexi nga fambiki hi munhu lexikulu eAfrika Khabinete yi hoyozerile khamphani ya vusirheleri na swa swihahampfhuka Milkor eka ku simekiwa loku humeleleke ka xihahampfhuka lexi nga fambiki hi munhu xa Milkor 380 (UAV), leswi vekaka Afrika-Dzonga exikarhi ka matiko lama yaka emahlweni ya hluvuka eka thekinoloji ya sisiteme ya xihahampfhuka lexi nga fambiki hi munhu.

src: I-Milkor 380 kuyidrowunu ekulu eyakhiwe e-Afrika begodu izokusetjenziswa libubulo lezevikeleko mayelana nokulungisa, ukulawula imikhawulo, imizamo yokubulunga kufakwe hlangana ukulwisana nokwetjelwa kwabobhejani amaphondo.
tgt: Milkor 380 i xihahampfhuka lexi nga fambiki hi munhu lexi akiweke eAfrika naswona xi ta tirhisiwa hi vumaki bya vusirheleri ku sivela, vulawuri bya mindzilikano, matshalatshala yo hlayisa ku katsa ku sivela ku hlota swi nga ri enawini.

src: Iinhlahlubo zikaMethriki Nezokuphela Komnyaka IKhabinethi ithabele ukuthoma kuhle kweenhlahlubo zomnyaka wee-2023 ze-National Senior Certificate (zikamethriki), ezithome nakama-30 kuSewula 2023.
tgt: Metiriki na swikambelo swa le ku heleni ka Lembe Khabinete yi amukerile ku sungula ka kahle ka swikambelo swa (National Senior Certificate) Xitifikheti xa le Henhla xa Rixaka ( swa metiriki), leswi sunguleke hi ti 30 ta Hlangula 2023.

src: Abantu abanesirhawu ebantwini be-Palestine basavalelekile ebujameni obumasikizi obengame abantwana, abomma nabantu abanganamlandu.
tgt: Swiboho swa Khabinete Xiyimo xa le Palestine Khabinete yi khomiwile hi tingana hi ku va mfumo wa Israel wu arile ku hlonipha milawu ya matiko ya misava no ya emahlweni wu tekela ehansi swiboho swa United States leswaku ku simekiwa ku yimisiwa ka nyimpi handle ko xupuriwa.

src: Ukurhayilwa kwabantu ngobunengi babo okwenziwa mbuso wakwa-Israel ebantwini be-Palestine, kusaragela phambili nokukhuphuka ngokwenani labantu abahlongakalako okufaka hlangana abomma nabantwana.
tgt: Tiphaseji ta ku pfuna vanhu va Palestine ta ha pfariwile na mbuyelo wo chavisa eka vana, vavasati na vaakatiko lava nga riki na nandzu.

src: Ikhabinethi iyelele ngokungawuvali umlomo ukuragela phambili namezwi aneziswana atjhiwo mzenda wakwa-Israeli awatjho eSewula Afrika, uNom.
tgt: Khabinete yi tlhele yi lemukile hi ku vilela hi ku ya emahlweni ka ku delela ka vayimeri va Israel eka Afrika-Dzonga, Tat.

src: Eliav Belotsercovsky, aphikisana namaSewula Afrika, ubudosiphambili beSewula Afrika ngaphakathi nangaphandle kombuso bufake hlangana izakhamuzi emphakathini ezikhuluma ngokubulawa kwabantu okwenziwe mbuso wakwa-Israeli phezu kwamaPalestina.
tgt: Eliav Belotsercovsky, loyi a lwisanaka na MaAfrika-Dzonga, vurhangeri bya Afrika-Dzonga hinkwabyo endzeni na le handle ka mfumo ku katsa vaaki vo va na xichavo lava vulavulaka hi ku lwisana na ku dlayeteriwa ka vanhu loku endliwaka hi mfumo wa Israel ku lwisana na vanhu va Palestine.

src: Amaganyana aneziswana enziwe mZenda u-Belotsercovsky ayatjhayisana neentatimende zabazenda ababili bangaphambilini be-Israeli abazitjho kuSewula Afrika (u-Illan Baruch noDorh.
tgt: Marito yo delela ya Muyimeri Belotsercovsky ya hambanile hi switatimende swa khale ka vayimeri vambirhi va Israel eka Afrika-Dzonga (Illan Baruch na Dok.

src: u-Alon Liel) ebebangatjhugulukiko nabahlathulula izenzo zombuswabo ngalokho okwenzeka kuma-Palestina njengebandlululo.
tgt: Alon Liel) lava nga cincangiki loko va hlamusela swiendlo swa vona hi mfumo wa vona ku lwisana na vanhu va Palestine tanihi xihlawuhlawu.

src: Amaganyana aneziswana atjhiwo ngezenzo ezimbi nabadosiphambili belizwe abenza isikhundla somzenda u-Belotsercovsky sibe sibaga khulu.
tgt: Marito yo delela ku kanetana na lava vulavulaka ku lwisana na tihanyi na varhangeri va tiko va endla xiyimo xa muyimeri Belotsercovsky ku va xi nga tiyiseleki.

src: Umbiko weragelo phambili lo, ngakelinye ihlangothi utjengisa ukungezeka kobuncani bokuqatjhwa ngokulingana kwemisebenzi okunqotjhiweko ukusukela ku-2% ukuya ku-3% ebantwini abanokukhubazeka ukusukela ngomnyaka weemali wee-2024/25, naziza kubuncani bamaphesende ali-7% wokuqatjhwa ngokulingana okunqotjhiweko ebantwini abanokukhubazeka kungakafiki umnyaka wee-2030.
tgt: Xiviko xa nhluvukiso xi tlhela xi kombisa ntlakuko wa pakani ya ndzingano hi swa ntirho wa minimamu ku suka eka 2% ku fika eka 3% eka vanhu lava nga na vutsoniwa ku suka hi lembe ximali ra 2024/2025, ku ya eka pakani ya minimamu xa 7% ya ndzingano hi swa ntirho eka vanhu lava nga na vutsoniwa hi 2030.

src: Ebrahim Rasool esikhundleni sokuba nguSihlalo we-Development Bank of Southern Africa.
tgt: Ku thoriwa ka Tat Ebrahim Rasool tanihi Mutshamaxitulu wa Bangi ya Nhluvukiso wa Dzongeni ra Afrika.

src: Ukuqatjhwa kuka-Mm.
tgt: Ku thoriwa ka Man Margaret Mosibudi Phiri tanihi xirho eka Bodo ya Rixaka ya Vulawuri bya Nyutliya

src: uMargaret Mosibudi Phiri esikhundleni sokuba lilunga leBhodi ye-National Nuclear Regulator.
tgt: Swiendlakalo Leswi Taka Mbulavurisano wo Lwisana na Vukungundzwana Mbulavurisano wo Lwisana na Vukungundzwana wu ta khomiwa hi ti 8 na ti 9 Hukuri 2023 eHotela ya Birchwood eKurhuleni ku hlengeleta vaaki eka ku lwisana na vukungundzwana hi ku fambisana na Kungu ra Rixaka ro Lwisana na Vukungundzwana etikweni Khabinete, hi Hukuri 2020, yi pasisile Kungu ra Rixaka ro Lwisana na Vukungundzwana (NACS 2020-2030).

src: Ijima lamaLanga ali-16 Wokuqeda Inturhu Eqothele Abantu Abasikazi NabeNtwana Lomnyaka wee-2023 Umnyaka lo utshwaya isikhumbuzo sama-25 sokuzibandakanya kweSewula Afrika eJimeni lamaLanga ali-16 Wokuqeda Inturhu Eqothele Abantu Abasikazi NabaNtwana elizakutjhejwa ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sirhabisa Amagadango Wokuqeda Inturhu Eqothele Abantu Abasikazi Nabentwana Nokubulawa Kwabo (i-GBVF): Asitjhiyi Namunye ngemuva”.
tgt: Masiku ya 16 ya Pfhumba ro Lwisana na Madzolonga eka Vavasati na Vana 2023 Lembe leri ri fungha malembe ya 25 ya ku tlangela Afrika-Dzonga ku va ri nghenelerile eka Masiku ya 16 ya Pfhumba ro Lwisana na Madzolonga eka vavasati na vana leri nga ta xiximiwa ehansi ka nhlokomhaka: Ku hatlisisa mintirho ku herisa Madzolonga ya rimbewu na ku dlayiwa ka vavasati (GBVF): Ku nga siyiwi munhu endzhaku”.

src: Ama-Protea ngokuzibekela indawo emdlalweni wangaphambi kowokugcina weBhigiri yePhasi ye-ICC 2023 e-India.
tgt: Xipano xa Proteas hi ku va xi kumile ndhawu eka (semi-finals) hafu ya xiphemu xo hetelela xa Khapu ya Misava ya ICC 2023 eIndia.

src: Ikutani yomjarho we-Moto GP i-Brad Binder njenganje osele angundunakulu opheleleko omnikazi werekhodi weSewula Afrika ngemva kokuqeda asesiqongolweni amahlandla amathathu ku-Thailand Grand Prix
tgt: Nhenha ya mphikizano wa Moto GP Brad Binder loyi sweswi a nga na rhekhodo ya phodiyamu ya tlilasi ya xiyimo xa le henhla xa Afrika-Dzonga endzhaku ka ku va a ri eka xiyimo xa vunharhu eka Thailand Grand Prix.

src: Isigora sokuthoma esikhamba ngesitulo samavilo eSewula Afrika u Macethandile Kulati mayelana nokulwela ithayitlelakhe ephaliswaneni lomnyaka wee-2023 International Federation of Body Builders and Fitness World Championship e-Slovenia.
tgt: Muaki wa miri wo sungula wa xitulu xa swigulana wa Afrika-Dzonga Macethandile Kulati hi ku sirhelela xidlodlo xa yena eka Tinghwazi ta Nhlangano wa Matiko ya Misava wa Vaaki va Miri na Ntirho wa Vutiolori hi 2023 eSlovenia.

src: Ama-Chartered Accountants weSewula Afrika ngokuthumba isikhundla esiphezulu ephenyweni le-Edelman global professional trust.
tgt: Van’watinkota va MaAfrika-Dzonga va kumile xiyimo xa le henhla eka nkambisiso wa vutshembeki bya xiphurofexinali bya misava hinkwayo wa Edelman.

src: UDorh Claude Mashego ngokuthumba athulwe ukuba ngu-Miss World South Africa begodu njenganje sekazokujamela iSewula Afrika ku-Miss World e-New Delhi, India ngoNobayeni nonyaka.
tgt: Dokodela Claude Mashego hi ku hlula eka mphikizano wo sungula wa Miss World Afrika-Dzonga naswona sweswi u ta yimela Afrika-Dzonga eka mphikizano wa Miss World eNew Delhi, India hi N’wendzamhala lembe leri.

src: Inani elibonakalako ekwande ngalo abantu abasebenzako KwaZulu-Natala (la bande khona ngee-152 000), ne-Limpopo (la bande khona ngee-70 000), neTlhagwini Tjingalanga (la bande khona ngee-61 000) kunye neMpumalanga, lisitjengiso sokuthi kancani kancani uyaphumelela umnqopho weHlelo lokwAkhiwa nokuVuselelwa komNotho (i-ERRP) ongcono, nonamandla noqalelela umuntu woke.
tgt: Nghelenelo wukulu eka ku engetela mitirho eKwazulu Natala (wu tlakukile hi 152 000), Limpopo (wu tlakukile hi 70 000), North West (wu tlakukile hi 61 000) na Mpumalanga, swi kombisa ku nonoka kambe swi humelerisa xivono xo Kungu ra ku Aka hi Vuntshwa na Nhlakarhelo wa Ikhonomi ro aka ku antswa, ku tiya no angarhela.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozela ukufaka isandla soke isikhathi kwalamakoro namabubulo alandelako: Ikoro ehlelekileko ikhuphuke ngemisebenzi ezii-287 000, kwathi ikoro engakahleleki yona yakhuphuka ngemisebenzi ezii-29 000 Ikoro yeemali (lapha kubalwa nemisebenzi yamabhizinisi) ikhuphuke ngemisebenzi ezii-237 000 Ikoro yomphakathi nezenzelwa zomphakathi yakhuphuka ngemisebenzi ezii-119 000, kwase kuthi kezokulima kwakhuphuka ngemisebenzi ezii-61 000.
tgt: Khabinete yi tsakela ku ya emahlweni no hoxa xandla ko tiya eka tiseketara na tiindasitiri leti landzelaka: Sekitara ya mitirho ya ximfumo yi tlakukile hi 287 000 loko yo ka yi nga ri ya ximfumo yi tlakukile hi 29 000 wa mitirho .2 Ya Timali (leyi katsaka vukorhokeri bya mabindzu) yi tlakukile 237 000 wa mitirho .3 Miganga na vukorhokeri bya vaaki yi tlakuka hi 119 000 wa mitirho na vurimi hi 61 000 wa mitirho.

src: IKhabinethi itjhejile nokuthi ukutlhayela kwegezi neensetjenziswa solo kusese namacaphazelo amambi kezokukhiqiza, neemayini, zokuthutha kunye nemisebenzi elisizo.
tgt: Khabinete yi tlhele yi vona vubihi lebyi gezi na nkayivelo wa lojisitiki swi ya ka emahlweni ku va na byona eka vumaki, mayini, swifambo na switirhisiwa.

src: IKhabinethi inesiqiniseko sokuthi khona duze nje izokuthoma ukubonakala indima yokuqeda ukuqinteliswa kwegezi nokutlhayelelwa ebubulweni lezokuthutha neleensetjenziswa.
tgt: Khabinete yi na ntshembo lowu vonakaka wa leswaku phurogirese yi ta vonaka ku nga ri khale eka ku hinguta ku tirhisiwa ka gezi hi ku siyerisana na swiphiqo eka vufambisi bya tinhundzu na indasitiri ya lojisitiki.

src: IKhabinethi iyathokoza nangokuthi nanyana kusese neentjhijilo ezisaseleko nje, kodwana inani lelutjha elingasebenziko kancani kancani liyehla (lehle nge-1.9% ukusukela ngekota ephelileko), kwathi inani lelutjha elisebenzako landa ngee-237 000, kwase kuthi inani lelutjha elisebenzako seliloke laba ziingidi ezisithandathu.
tgt: Khabinete yi tlhele yi tsakisiwa hi leswaku hambi ku ri na swirhalanganyi leswi saleke, mpfumaleko wa mitirho eka vatshwa wu ya ehansi hi switsongotsongo (ku chika hi 1.9% kusuka eka kotara leyi hundzeke), na a 237 000 ka tlakuko eka nomboro ya vantshwa lava lava thoriweke, swi fika eka nhlayo ya 6 miliyoni yo thoriwa ka vantshwa.

src: Ukuvulwa kwephrojekthi yakwa-Ford Motor Company neye-P&G kubufakazi besandla esihle sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sehlelo lokukhuphula amasiso ngekhonferensi yezamasiso yeSewula Afrika nobufakazi bokufakazela ngobutjha ukuthi iSewula Afrika ililizwe elenyulwa ngamanye amazwe ukusisela kilo.
tgt: Ku simeliwa ka tiphurojeke ta Khapani ya Mimovha ya Ford and P&G i vumbhoni bya nkoka byo nghenisa vuvekisi bya Purisidente Cyril Ramaphosa hi ku endla Tinhlengeletano ta Vuvekisi eAfrika-Dzonga, no tiyisisa Afrika-Dzonga tanihi ndhawu ya vuvekisi byo tihlawulela.

src: Ukutholakala Kwenyama Ebovu YeSewula Afrika Ebukhosini Be-Saudi Arabia IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukutlikitlwa kwesivumelwano senyama ebovu esitlikitlwe nobuKhosi be-Saudi Arabia, lokhuya nabekubanjwe umHlangano wezamaSiso hlangana kwabaRholi be-Saudi Arabia nebe-Afrika.
tgt: 3 Nyama yo tshwuka ya le Afrika-Dzonga ya kumeka eKingdom ya Saudi Arabia Khabinete yi amukela ku sayiniwa ka ntwanano wa nyma yo tshwuka na Kingdom ya Saudi-Arabia, hi nkarhi wa Samiti ya Vuvekisi ya Saudi-African.

src: Lesisivumelwano sililiqha eliqakathekileko ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi inyama ebovu yeSewula Afrika ikghona ukungena emakethe eqakathekileko ibe iqinise ukuya phambili ubuhle obenziwa yikoro yezokufuya nokulima ekuhlunyisweni komnotho nekuvulweni kwemisebenzi.
tgt: Ntwanano lowu wu kombisa xitepe xa kahle eku tiyisiseni leswaku switirhisiwa swa nyama yo tshwuka ya Afrika-Dzonga yi kota ku nghena eka timakete ta nkoka, no yisa emahlweni ku tiyisa ku hoxa xandla ka sekitara ya vurimi eka ku kurisa no tumbuluxa mitirho.

src: IKhabinethi izwakalise ukuthokoza kwayo ebubulweni lezokulima, khulu khulu ku-SA Wine and Agricultural Chamber of Business, eyaziwa ngokuthi yi-Agbiz, ngokucitha kwayo imizamo yokuphosela ilizwe nekoro yezokulima ngeliweni lokuqalana ngamehlo amambi hlangana kwamakhuwa nabantu abanzima, ngokuhlathulula kwayo msinyana natjhatjhalazi imibiko edunga amaqiniso nayiqeda ukuzwakala emphakathini.
tgt: Khabinete yi kombisile ku tsakela eka indasitiri ya vurimi, ngopfungopfu the SA Wine na Agricultural Chamber of Business, leyi tivekaka hi Agbiz, ku va swi alanile no ringeta ku wisa tiko na sekitara hi xiphiqo xa hlonghe hi ku basisa ku cinca loko hi xihatla ku nga se yisiwa evanhwini.

src: Ubujamo benu ngendaba le butjengise ukuthi mbala niwamukele ummoya okhwezelelwe maBhokobhoko, othi Simandla Ndawonye (Stronger Ndawonye).
tgt: Maendlelo ya n’wina eka leswi, ya komba swinene leswaku mi amukerile moya wo lava mavonelo eka vanhu hi ntshembo wa Springboks wa Nkoka wa Ntirhisano.

src: Zevakatjhobukelo IKhabinethi ibutjhejile ubuhlobo bokusebenzisana obakheke hlangana komNyango wezeVakatjhobukelo ne-Google njengehlelo elizakuba namandla wokuphendula izinto elizakusiza ukuphakamisa iSewula Afrika njengendawo ephambili ekhanukelwa ukuvakatjhelwa ziimvakatjhibukeli.
tgt: 5 Vupfhumba Khabinete yi vonile vuthirhisano lebyi tumbuluxiweke exikarhi ka Ndzawulo ya Vupfhumba na Google byi tisile ku cinca loko ku nga ta pfunete ku tlukusa Afrika-Dzonga tanihi ndhawu yo saseka ya vupfhumba.

src: Ipi Yokulwa Nobulelesi Nobukhohlakali Ipi Elungelelweko Yokulwa Nobulelesi IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuthunyelwa kwamajoni azii-3 300 zebutho lamajoni i-SANDF, ukusukela ngomhla wama-28 kuSewula wee-2023 ukuyokufika kumhla wama-28 kuSihlabantangana wee-2024 kobanyana ayokusiza amaPholisa (webutho le-SAPS) nabanye abathobelisimthetho ukucitha umukghwa wokumayina ngokungamthetho elizweni leSewula Afrika.
tgt: Khabinete yi amukela ku thoriwa ka 3 300 wa timembara ta Vuthu ra Vusirheleri ra Afrika-Dzonga ra Rixaka (SANDF), kusuka 28 2023 ku fika 28 Nhlangula 2023, ku seketela Vukorhokeri bya Maphorisa ya Afrika Dzonga (SAPS) na swiyenge swin’wana swa nawu ku tirhana na ku ceriwa ka timayini swi nga ri nawini etikweni.

src: Umbiko wendima yomsebenzi lo hlangana nawo kubalwa iingcenye ezibunane kezilitjhumi-nantandathu (16) eziphakanyiselwe ukwenza amatjhuguluko wemithetho yepalamende ezakusebenza ngeemphakamiso ezithileko ezibizwe ngamagama zeKomitjhini yePhenyo ngokuThunjwa komBuso eziphambi kwePalamende njenganje.
tgt: 7 Mbhurisano wa Khasele ya Rixaka yo Tsundzuxa ku lwa na Vukungundwana (NACAC) Khabinete yi amukele ku humelela ka ku khomiwa ka Mbhurisano wa Rixaka wa NACAC, lowu a wu langutile hi vurhon’wana phurogirese yo endla Maendlelo ya Rixaka yo lwa na Vukungundwana na Swikoxo swa Khomixini ya Huvo ya maveriveri ya ku Lawuriwa ka Mfumo leyi nga ePalamende sweswi.

src: IKhabinethi ibikelwe ngokuthi uthome ngoMgwengweni wee-2023 umsebenzi wokwakhiwa ngobutjha kwe-Tzaneen Dam, kanti kulinganiswa ukuthi umsebenzi lo uzakuphela ngoSihlabantangana wee-2025.
tgt: 12 Nhlayiso wa Mati Khabinete yi tsakiwile hi swiviko swa leswaku swiphiqo leswi endleke ku va na ku nonoka eka ku sungula phurojeke ya Mzimvubu Dam swi lulamisile naswona ndhawu yo tirheka ka yona yi sunguriwile emasunguleni ya Hukuri, loko ku mburisana na tihosi hi leswi khumbaka vaaki swi ya emahlweni.

src: IKhabinethi ihlathululelwe ukuthi siragela phambili ngokuhlangana ngamalanga isiqhema esiyihlanganyela sabomasipala bamaDorobha amaKhulu (i-Ekurhuleni, iJwanisbhege ne-Tshwane) kunye ne-Rand Water, sihlanganela ukurarulula imirabhu yabonobangela bemiraro yamanzi.
tgt: Khabinete yi tivisiwile leswaku ku tlakusiwa ka khumbi ra Damu ra Clanwilliam ku engetela ndahwu yo chela mati ku ya 344 wa timiliyoni ta timitara ku vuyerisa vanhu va le Masipala wa West Coast District, Masipala wa Cederberg na Masipala wa Matzikama Local swi ya emahlweni.

src: Ukusukela ngomhla wama-23 kuVelabahlinze wee-2023, yoke imibhotjhongo ye-analogu eli-123 engaphezulu kwe-694 Megahertz icinyiwe eemfundeni ezine ebezisasele leziimfunda-ke yiPumalanga Kapa, neKwaZulu-Natala, neTjingalanga Kapa kunye ne-Gauteng.
tgt: Kusuka 23 Mawuwani 2023, 123 wa tithirasimita ta tianalogo hinkwato ta 694 Megaheze ti timiwile eka swifundzakulu leswi a swi sele swa Kapa-Vuxa, KwaZulu-Natal, Kapa-Vupeladyambu na Gauteng.

src: Iminyango neenjamiso ethole imiphumela enganamakolo yande ukusukela ema-94 emnyakeni weemali wee-2018/2019 yayokuba li-147 ngomnyaka weemali wee-2022/2023, la kubikwe khona ubungcono baqobe mnyaka kuhlolwa iincwadi.
tgt: Tindzawulo na tindhawu ta mfumo leti nga fikelela tioditi to basa ku nga ri na leswi kumiweke (Oditi yo basa) ti tlakukile kusuka ka 94 hi 2018/2019 ku ya ka 147 hi 2022/2023, ku tivisiwa ku antswa ka lembe na lembe.

src: Iminyango neenjamiso etholakele inganamakolo eencwadini zayo ili-162 lelinani-ke lijamele ama-39% weenjamiso iincwadi zazo ezihloliweko.
tgt: Tindzawulo na tindhawu ta mfumo leti nga fikelela tioditi to basa ku ri na leswi kumiweke i 162, naswona leswi swi vula 39% ya tindhawu leti oditiweke.

src: Iinjamiso neminyango ebe namakolo eencwadini zayo zeemali iphunguke ukusuka ema-25 ngomnyaka weemali we-2018/2019 zayokuba zihlanu ngomnyaka weemali wee-2022/2023 lokhu-ke kujamele i-1% kwaphela yeenjamiso iincwadi zazo ezihloliweko.
tgt: Tindhawu ta mfumo na tindzawulo leti nga na swilaveko swo pfumala vutihlamuleri yi ehlile kusuka ka 25 hi nkarhi wo vika hi 2018/2019 ti ya ka 5 hi nkarhi wo vika hi 2022/2023 naswona leswi swi vula 1% ya tindhawu leti oditiweke.

src: Nanyana u-AGSA abika ukuthi ilinganiselwa e-R14 lamabhiliyoni imali elahlekileko nje, nokho namagadango wokulungisa okungakalungi emibikweni yeemali nawo atjengisa ubungcono ukuya nokuya kwesikhathi.
tgt: 18 Vuxaka bya Matiko– Vuendzi bya Ximfumo eQatar Vhiki leri hundzeke, Puresidente Cyril Ramaphosa u gimetile riendzo ra ximfumo eQatar eka ku rhambiwa hi His Highness Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani, Amir wa mfumo wa Qatar.

src: Zobudlelwano Namazwe Ngamazwe – Ivakatjho Lombuso E-Qatar Ngeveke ephelileko uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa bekavakatjhe e-Qatar ngevakatjho lombuso njengoba amenywe ngoPhakamileko u-Sheik Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani, omBusi womBuso we-Qatar.
tgt: 19 Timhaka ta Tipolotiki ta Misava Khabinete yi vurile nakambe xikombelo lexi endliweke hi varhangeri va Afrika xo herisa nyimpi eGaza, hi nkarhi wa Samiti ya African-Saudi eRiyadh leyi a yi khomiwe hi Crown Prince Mohammed Bin Salman.

src: Imigidingo yemiNyaka ema-20 hlangana nayo kuzakuba khona iinkhulu zombuso zakhathesi nezangaphambilini kunye neKomitjhini ye-AUkusetjenziswa Kweemali Ze-akhawundi Yokubuyisa Ipahla Etholakele Ngobulelesi (i-CARA) IKhabinethi ivumele ukusetjenziswa kweemali ku-CARA ukucitha umukghwa wokumayina ngokungamthetho namanye amacala.
tgt: JET-IP yi endlile ku nghenelela ko tala loku Afrika-Dzonga yi ku lavaka na vuvekisi lebyi lavekaka ku tiko ri cinca ku ya ka khabono ya le hansi na ikhonomi yo tiyiseka ku cinca ka maxelo hi ku fambisana na National Determined Contributions loku andlariweke hi UKhabinete yi na mavonelo ya leswaku JET-IP yi kombisa ku tinyiketela ka Afrika-Dzonga eka ku cinca loku fambelanaka na laveko wa eneji wa tiko.

src: Kubekelwe ngeqadi imali eyi-R2 172 359 ezakusetjenziselwa ukulwa nomukghwa wokumayina ngokungamthetho, osolo uyingozi phezu komnotho weSewula Afrika.
tgt: JET-IP yi ta lawuriwa hi ku hlangana ka ku cinca eka sekitara ya eneji, ku katsa Mpumalanga Just Transition, New Energy Vehicles and Green Hydrogen, na tin’wana.

src: UmThethomlingwa lo unikela isiqunto sikarhulumende amandla wokuhlanganisa i-PetroSA, ne-South African Gas Development Company kunye ne-Strategic Fuel Fund.
tgt: Ku thoriwa nakambe ka Dr Molefi Motuku tanihi Muofisirinkulu wa Xirho xa Huvonkulu (CEO) ya Council for Mineral Technology (MINTEK) (Ku thoriwa nakambe) Ku thoriwa ka Mr Siyabulela Koyo Tanihi CEO ya Amatola Water Ku thoriwa nakambe Ms Poppy Khoza as Murhangeri wa Vufambisi bya South African Civil Aviation Authority (Ku pfuxetiwa ka kotiraka) Swiro swa Phongolo – Umzimkhulu Catchment Management Agency Board.

src: Thava Kelly (uSihlalo)
tgt: Manana Tsakane Zwane (Xandla xa Mutshama-Xitulu)

src: Sibusiso Makhanya (iSekela likaSihlalo)
tgt: Manana Ponatshego Lizzy Mothibi

src: Hlengiwe Ndlovu
tgt: Tatana Louis Van Oudtshoorn.

src: Ngaphasi kwesivumelwano seminyaka emihlanu, i-Transnet Freight Rail izakusebenzisa iinthuthi zayo zamatanka we-amoniya azili-128 ukukuthutha i-amoniya iyisusa emafemini we-Sasol iyise kubathengi, kuthi i-Sasol yona ibhadele ihlelo lokulungiswa nokutjhejwa kweenthuthezi.
tgt: Ehansi ka ntwanano wa ntlhanu wa malembe, Transnet Freight Rail yi ta tirhisa swifambo swa yona swa 128 swa tithenkara ta amoniya ku tleketla amoniya ku suka eka switirhisiwa swa Sasol ku ya eka vaxavi naswona hi ku hlamula, Sasol yi ta hakela nongonoko wo hlayisa na ku lunghisa swifambo.

src: I-QLFS iveze bona imisebenzi yekoro engakahleleki ikhuphuke ngee-124 000, yezeemali ngee-128 000, yezeenthuthi ngee-57 000, zemayini ngee-37 000 kuthi imisebenzi yokusiza emakhaya/yemakhwitjhini yanda ngee-18 000.
tgt: QLFS yi komba leswaku xiyenge xa mitirho leyi ng ariki ya ximfumo swi engeterile hi 124 000, swa timali hi 128 000, vutleketli hi 57 000, swa migodi hi 37 000 ya mitirho naswona vatirhi va le makaya hi mitirho ya 18 000.

src: Ikhabinethi ikhombele zoke iinkoro kobana zisekele Ihlelo Lokwakhiwa Nokuvuselelwa Komnotho (i-ERRP), elisiza ngokunikela imisebenzi namathuba wokuziphilisa kumaSewula Afrika aziingidigidi.
tgt: Khabinete yi rhamba swiyenge hinkwaswo ku seketela pfhumba ra Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan, leri ri pfunaka ku nyika swivandlanene swa mitirho na ku tihanyisa ka Maafrika-Dzonga.

src: Ama-20 weminyaka weHlelo eliNatjisiweko lemiSebenzi yesiTjhaba (i-EPWP) Umnyaka wee-2024 ungewama-20 weminyaka solo kwasungulwa i-EPWP, ejamele enye yeendatjana zepumelelo zeSewula Afrika ngamahlelo wokuqatjhwa komphakathi ngobunengi begodu kulihlelo elikhulu lokulwisana nomtlhago bekube kunje.
tgt: Ntlangelo wa vu20 wa Phurogireme ya Ndlandlamuxo wa Swa Mitirho (EPWP) Lembe ra 2024 ri fungha 20 wa malembe w aku va kona ka EPWP, leyi yi yimelaka swin’wana swa switori swa ku humelela ka Afrika-Dzonga eka nongonoko wa rona wa mohakelo wa mitirho eka vanhu naswona hi wun’wana wa migingiriko leyikulu yo susa vusweti.

src: Ikhabinethi ifumene umbiko mayelana nokuthonywa kunye nepumelelo ye-EPWP, ihlelo likarhulumende esele linikele iingidi zamaSewula Afrika angasebenziko amathuba wemisebenzi ukusukela ngesikhathi eyasungulwa ngaso.
tgt: Khabinete yi kumile nkatsakanyo eka ku simeka na ku humelela ka EPWP, nongonoko lowukulu wa mfumo lowu nyikeke mamiliyoni ya swivadlanene swa mitirho eka vapfumari va mitirho va Afrika-Dzonga ku suka loko wu sungurile.

src: Amahlelo alungisiwe ukuphumelelisa amathuba wemisebenzi aseleko azii-390 973 ngenyanga kaNtaka 2024.
tgt: Makungu ya le ndleleni ku fikelela 390 973 wa swivandla swa mitirho leswi saleke ku nga si fika Nyenyuanyani 2024.

src: Kilawa amathuba wemisebenzi azii-4 609 000, iimfunda ezintathu eziphuma phambili lapha amathuba wemisebenzi avulwe khona kuKwaZulu-Natala, lapha kuvulwe imisebenzi esi-1 064 000 (eyi-23%), ilandelwe yiPumalanga Kapa ngee-903 789 (eyi-20%) kulandele iTjingalanga Kapa ngee-508 954 (eyi-11%).
tgt: Eka swivandla swa mitirho swa 4 609 000, swifundzhankulu swinharhu leswi nga ehenhla laha swivandla swa intirho swi tumbuluxiweke kona i KwaZulu-Natal, leyi tihlamuleleka hi 1 064 000 wa swivandla (23%), yi landzela hi Kapavuxa, hi 903 789 (20%) na Kapa-Vupeladyambu hi 508 954 (11%).

src: Eziphathelene Norhulumende Amakhetho Welizweloke Womnyaka wee-2024 Ikhabinethi isamukele isimemezelo sikaMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa esithi ilanga lamaKhetho Welizweloke nguLesithathu, 29 kuMrhayili 2024, ngemva kokubonisana kwakhe neKomitjhini yezamaKhetho eziJameleko yeSewula Afrika nabondunakulu bazozoke iimfunda ezilithoba ngobujamo bokulungela amakhetho welizweloke neweemfunda.
tgt: Timhaka ta Mfumo Mihlawulo ya Mani na Mani ya 2024 Khabinete yi amukela xitiviso xa Puresidente Cyril Ramaphosa xa leswaku 29 Mudyaxihi 2024 i siku ra Mihlawulo ya Mani na Mani, hi ku landza ku tihlanganisa ka yena na Khomixini ya Nhlawulo ya Afrika-Dzonga na Tiphirimiya ta kaye wa swifundzhankulu mayelana na ku tilulamisela ka swona eka mihlawulo ya tiko na ya swifundzhankulu.

src: Ukulwa Nobulelesi Ikhabinethi ibuke Ibutho Lamapholisa weSewula Afrika ngokusebenza ngokuzikhandla, okudosele ekutheni kubotjhwe abantu abalikhomba mayelana nokubulawa kuka-Kiernana 'AKA' Forbes nomnganakhe u-Tebello 'Tibz' Motsoane.
tgt: Ku sivela vugevenga Khabinete yi hoyozela Ndzawulo ya Maphorisa ya Afrika-Dzonga eka ntirho wa vona lowo tsandza ku karhala, lowu ng ava fikisa eka ku khoma vanhu va nkombo hi mayelana na ku dlaya ka Kiernan 'AKA' Forbes na munghana wa yena Tebello ‘Tibz’ Motsoane.

src: Umhlangano lo ugandelele nokuqakatheka kokubuyisa zomnotho nezehlalakuhle ngemva kwe-COVID-19, kunye neemfundo ezifundiweko ngokulungela umbulalazwe nokuqalana nawo kunye nokuvikeleka kwekhonthinenthi.
tgt: Puresidente Ramaphosa nakambe u andlarile xiviko xa tikonkulu xa ku hlamulana na ntungu wa Mavabyi ya Khorona (COVID-19) na xiyimo xo tiyimisela eka mixungeto ya rihanyo leyi ya ha taka, tanihi xiyimo xa yena xa Nhenha ya AU eka COVID-19.

src: Ikhabinethi inethemba lokobana iSewula Afrika izakusingatha ngepumelelo umbuthano we-G20, njengombana ikhe yakwenza lokho ngeminye imibuthano emikhulu efana newe-Brazil, Russia, India, China neSewula Afrika (BRICS) neForamu yomThetho wokuKhulisa nokuNikelwa kwe-Afrika amaThuba (i-AGOA).
tgt: Khabinete yina ku tshemba leswaku Afrika-Dzonga ri ta humelerisa Nhlengeletano ya G20, tanihiloko ri swi endlile hi swiendleko leswikulu swo tanihi hi Nhlengeletano ya Brazil, Russia, India, China na Afrika-Dzonga (BRICS) na African Growth and Opportunity Act Forum.

src: UbeNgameli be-G20 bulethela iSewula Afrika ithuba lokudosa phambili iimfiso zamamakethe asakhulako.
tgt: G20 hi Ndzawulo ya Puresidente yi nyka Afrika-Dzonga nkarhi wo tiyisisa ku navela ka rona ka timakete leti ta ha kulaka.

src: Ngesikhathi isingatha i-G20, iSewula Afrika izakuragela phambili nokuhlahlwa ziimbopho zelizweli zokuthuthukisa amakareko welizwe kunye newekhontinenthi.
tgt: Tanihiloko ri rhurhela G20, ku teka xiave ka Afrika-Dzonga eka foramu swi ta ya emahlweni ku leteriwa hi ku tiyimisela ka tiko ku yisa emahlweni ku navela ka tiko xikan’we na lokuya ka tikonkulu ra Afrika.

src: Koke ukuqatjhwa kulawulwa kufakazeleka kweencwadi zefundo ezikhambisana nomsebenzi umuntu aqatjhelwe wona kunye nokuhlanjululwa kwebizo lomuntu okufaneleko.
tgt: Ku thoriwa ka Tatana Snike Thulani Sibuyi tanihi Matsalani wa Ndzawulo ya Maphorisa eka Ndzawulo ya Vutsalani Ku thoriwa ka Tatana Xolile Sizani hi Mulawurinkulu (CEO) wa PetroSKu thoriwa ka Manana Nombulelo Guliwe tanihi Mulawurinkulu wa swa Vupfumba eAfrika-Dzonga.

src: Snike Thulani Sibuyi esikhundleni sokuba nguNobhala weButho lamaPholisa emNyangweni we-Civilian Secretariat for Police Service.
tgt: Ku thoriwa ka swirho swa Bodo ya Vupfumba ya Afrika-Dzonga: Ms Makhosazana Khanyile (Mutshamaxitulu) Adv Lizelle Dominique Jordaan (Xandla xa Mutshamaxitulu) Dr Gregory J Davids Tatana Ikaneng Ephraim Pilane Prof Motlhago Stella Bvuma Manana Nqabomzi Haya Tatana Rajesh Mahabeer Tatana Ayanda V Mazibuko Manana Maija de Rijk-Uys Dr Mzolisi Michael Toni na Manana Uveshnee Pillay tanihi muyimeri wa Ndzawulo ya Ndzawulo ya Vupfhumba.

src: UmHlangano Omkhulu Wokuthuthukiswa Komthangalasisekelo Ngokunzinzileko eSewula Afrika (SIDSSA) 2024 Koke sele kujame ngehlelo lakhona mayelana ne-SIDSSA 2024, ezakubanjelwa eKapa kusukela nakali-17 ukufikela nakali-19 kuNtaka 2024.
tgt: Xipano xi winile milenge mimbirhi 4-0 hi ku angarha, naswona va ta hlangana na Nigeria eka rhengu ro hetelela hi Dzivamisoko 2024.

src: Ukusisa Kumthangalasisekelo IKhabinethi yamukela ukuvulwa kwephrojekthi ebiza amabhiliyoni ama-R3,4 i-Newlyn Park Bayhead Rail Terminal eKhumulweni leenKepe eThekwini, yesilinganiso se-640 000 square metres seendawo zokubeka, ithungelelwano lesiporo kunye neendawo ezivulekileko zokubeka.
tgt: Khabinete yi amukerile ku pfuriwa ka phurojeke ya R3,4 wa tibiliyoni ta Xiporo xa Newlyn Park Bayhead Rail Terminal eRibuweni ra Durban, leyi nga na 640 000 wa swikweremitara swa vuhlayiselo, matlhelo ya swiporo na vuhlayiselo lebyi pfulekeke.

src: Amasiso la enze ukuthi kuvuleke imisebenzi eyi-4 013 ekorweni yezokwakha kunye nemisebenzi yasafuthi lapho kuzokuqatjhwa khona abantu abayi-1 000, ngesibalo ekuqalwe bona singenyuka njengombana indawo le ikwazi ukuphatha umthwalo omnenngi.
tgt: Eku pfuxeteni ka netiweke ya swiporo swa tiko ra hina, Khabinete yi tlhele yi amukela ku vuyiseriwa loku humelelaka ka Ejensi ya Switimela swo Rhwala Vanhu ya Afrika-Dzonga (PRASA) ya vukorhokeri bya ntlhanu bya nkoka bya Metrorail ku tsemakanya Gauteng, KwaZulu-Natal na Kapa-Vupeladyambu.

src: Ukusisa kumthangalasisekelo kuthuthukiselwa ekwakhiweni kweendawo ezitja, ukwenziwa ngcono kweendlela kunye nokuqinisa, begodu nokulungiswa ngokukhethekileko kwethungelelwano leendlela zesitjhaba esifundenesi.
tgt: Vuvekisi Khabinete yi amukerile ku pfuriwa ka ndhawu leyintshwa ya Tetra Pak eKwaZulu-Natal hi Phuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa, leyi kokeke vuvekisi bya R500 wa timiliyoni.

src: Iminyaka ema-30 yeKululeko neNtando yeNengi IKhabinethi yamukele nokuhlonywa kwesikhumbuzo sokugidinga iminyaka ema-30 yeKululeko neNtando yeNengi, esibanjwe ngaphasi kwesiqubulo esithi: “30 years of Democracy, Partnership and Growth”.
tgt: Khabinete yi amukerile ku simekiwa ka xitsundzuxo xa 30 wa Malembe ya Ntshunxeko na Xidemokirasi, lexi khomeriweke ehansi ka nhlokomhaka leyi nge: “30 wa malembe ya Xidemokirasi, Ntirhisano na ku Kula”.

src: IKhabinethi ikhombele woke umuntu bona alisebenzise itshwayo elisemthethweneli elitholakala ngezakheko ezihlukahlukeneko bona lisebenziseke lula kubunzinzolwazi beZiko likaRhulumende lezokuThintana nokuNikela ngeLwazi (i-GCIS) WEBTOKEN.
tgt: Khabinete yi komberile un’wana na un’wana ku tirhisa logo ya ximfumo leyi kumekaka hi tifomati to hambana ku oloveriwa ku yi tirhisa eka webusayiti ya GCIS eka: WEBTOKEN.

src: Joe Phaahla ngokukhethelwa kwakhe ku-Global Fund Board ukuthoma nalili-1 kuMrhayili 2024.
tgt: Mahungu Ku hoyozelaKhabinete yi hundzisa mahungu ya yona yo hoyozela ni ku navelela mikateko eka:• Holobye wa Rihanyo Dkd Joe Phaahla eka ku thoriwa ka yena eka Huvo ya Nkwama wa Misava hinkwayo ku sukela hi ti1 Mudyaxihi 2024.

src: UDorh Phaahla uyokusebenza njengomjameli wamazwe asesiphandeni sePumalanga newe-Afrika engeSewula.
tgt: Dkd Phaahla u ta tirha tanihi muyimeri wa xifundzankulu xa Afrika-Vuxa na Dzonga.• Mamozileme ya MaAfrika-Dzonga xikan’we na lava va nga emisaveni hinkwayo, ngopfungopfu ePalestina, hi xiendlakalo xa Eid al-Fitr.

src: • IKomitjhini yezokuPhalisana eSewula Afrika ngokuthumba abonongorwana ababili ku-2024 Antitrust Writing Awards ebeyibanjelwe e-Washington DC kunye nangokutjhejwa kwayo ngomsebenzi ewenza ngokulamula ngethungelelwano lommoya i-Online Intermediation Platforms Market Inquiry.
tgt: Nkhuvo wa Eid al-Fitr wu fungha makumu ya n’hweti yo kwetsima ya Ramadan, leyi hi nkarhi wa yona Mamozileme ma titsone swakudya siku na siku, naswona ehansi ka swiyimo swo tika swinene ePalestina.• Khomixini ya Mphikizano ya Afrika-Dzonga hi ku wina masagwadi mambirhi eka Masagwadi ya ku Tsala ya Antitrust ya 2024 leyi khomeriweke eWashington DC na ku xiximiwa eka Vulavisisi bya yona bya Makete bya Tipulatifomo ta Vuhlanganisi bya le ka Inthanete lebyi rhangelaka.

src: Ikomitjhini le ithumbe unongorwana ngombiko wayo wokugcina kunye nesiqunto sayo kwathi omunye unongorwana waba ngewokufundisa malungana nokwahlukahlukana kwamaphaliswano emakethe yeDijithali yeSewula Afrika, ehlangothini lezokuvakatjha nezevakatjhobukelo.
tgt: Yi hlurile sagwadi eka xiviko xa yona xo hetelela na xiboho kasi sagwadi rin’wana a ri ri ra atikili ya dyondzo eka ku cinca-cinca ka mphikizano eka timakete ta xidijithali ta Afrika-Dzonga eka tendzo na vupfhumba.

src: Amezwi WokutjhiriyaIKhabinethi idlulise amagama wokutjhiriya abangani nomndeni ka-: • Nom.
tgt: MichaveleloKhabinete yi yisa nchavelelo eka mindyangu ni vanghana va:• Tat Tony Heard (86), loyi a a ri nghwazi ya timfanelo ta ximunhu, ku nga ri na xihlawuhlawu, muteki wa mahungu wo xiximeka, muhleri la dzunisiwaka na khale ka mutsundzuxi wo hlawuleka eka Hofisi ya Phuresidente.• Khabinete yi ya emahlweni yi joyina Phuresidente Ramaphosa ku hundzisela marito yo chavelela eka mfumo na vanhu va tiko ra Botswana endzhaku ka mhangu leyi hlomulaka mbilu ya bazi leri a ri rhwale vapfhumba va Paseka ku ya eMoria.

src: Tony Heard (obekaneminyaka ema-86), obekayikutani ekulweleni amalungelo wobuntu, ukungabandlululani, obekambikiindaba owaziwako, umhleli okhutheleko kunye nomluleki wangaphambilini e-Ofisini kaMengameli.• IKhabinethi ibuye ihlanganyele noMengameli u-Ramaphosa ekudluliseni amezwi wokutjhiriya uRhulumende kunye nabantu be-Botswana ngemva kwengozi yebhesi eyibangamatlhuwo eyayilayitjhe abantu abebaya ekonzweni yePasika e-Moria.
tgt: Hi Ravumune ra ti11 Dzivamisoko 2024, Phuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa na ntangha ya yena hi ntirho wa le Botswana, Phuresidente Mokgweetsi Masisi va endzele ndhawu leyi ku nga humelela mhangu ya bazi eLimpopo leyi nga dlaya vanhu va 45 laha ku nga pona ntsena n’wana wa malembe ya nhungu hi vukhale.• Tat Luke Fleurs (24), muntshwa, loyi a ri mutlangi wa le ndzhaku wa Kaizer Chiefs kasi tlhelo a ri khale ka mutlangi wa matiko ya misava wa le hansi, loyi a dlayiweke hi ndlela yo tihanyi hi nkarhi wa ku tekeriwa swilo.

src: NgelesiNe, nakali-11 kuSihlabantangana 2024, uMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa nomlinganakhe ngesikhundla we-Botswana u-Mokgweetsi Masisi bakhambe bayokuhlola endaweni yesehlakalo sengozi yebhesi e-Limpopo, ekuyingozi ethethe abantu abama-45, lapho kusinde khona umntwana weminyaka ebu-8 ubudala kwaphela.• Nom.
tgt: Khabinete yi tlhele yi amukela ku khomiwa ka vaehleketeleriwa va tsevu mayelana na ku dlayiwa ka Luke Fleurs.• Khabinete yi joyinile Phuresidente Ramaphosa ku nyikela marito yo chavelela eka mfumo na vanhu va Riphabliki ra Mozambique endzhaku ka mhangu elwandle laha ku nga lova kwalomu ka 100 ra vanhu.
